title: Software Engineer
description:
Your Mission

The Global Analytics & Data Products Team is looking for a software engineer to join our team. Your mission is to create and extend our cloud-based data platform infrastructure.

Priorities can change in a fast-paced environment like ours, so this role includes, but is not limited to the following responsibilities:
â€¢ Design and implement secure, scalable, high-performance, and robust data services for connected vehicle data in distributed data processing platforms using REST, gRPC, and GraphQL
â€¢ Design, extend, and review data architecture, model, flow, and integration â€“ be hands-on and involved with every stage of the software development life cycle
â€¢ Partner with data engineers and data scientists to meet the need of upstream and downstream dependencies
â€¢ Develop state-of-the-art functional code â€“ influence/establish the software development culture of the team
â€¢ Establish standards and best practices for instrumentation within software engineering

Top Performers will... be able to demonstrate:
â€¢ Taking abstract concepts ideas and implementing them in a robust manner
EOE/Disability/Veteran

Basic Qualifications:
â€¢ BA/BSc in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related technical discipline preferred
â€¢ 2 or more years of experience in the software engineering and software development life cycle
â€¢ Experience with more than one coding language
â€¢ Experience with one or more functional languages such as F#, Scala, or Haskell
â€¢ Familiarity with streaming technologies like Kafka
â€¢ Experience with continuous integration tools like Jenkinsor GitHub Actions
â€¢ Experience with creating containerized applications using Docker and running them on Kubernetes
â€¢ Experience writing SQL queries
â€¢ Experience in AWS using IAM, EKS, EC2, S3

Preferred Qualifications:
â€¢ Experience using functional Scala libraries such as Cats or ZIO
â€¢ Experience working with cloud Big Data platforms (, Spark, Google BigQuery, Azure Data Warehouse, etc.)
â€¢ Experience with workflow management engines (, Airflow, Luigi, Azure Data Factory, etc.)
At Stellantis, we assess candidates based on qualifications, merit and business needs. We welcome applications from people of all gender identities, age, ethnicity, nationality, religion, sexual orientation and disability. Diverse teams will allow us to better meet the evolving needs of our customers and care for our future

title: Software Engineer - C++
description:
Wizcorp is looking for Software Engineers for a selection of diverse fields. Depending on your background, skills, and experience weâ€™ll find the most suitable role within our teams for you. We value human skills and character as much as we do experience and proficiency.

Is this job for me? ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ¦°ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ¦³ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ¦²

You have a few years of work experience developing software professionally. C++ is a core programming language in your tool box, even though you might be using one or two other languages for your daily tasks. Youâ€™re not afraid to deep-dive into the engine and code bases to make some improvements.

Sounds like you? Then this job is for you!

About Wizcorp ğŸ¦„ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µğŸ®

Wizcorp is a highly specialized game development studio based in Tokyoand operating 100% remotely. We are a cross-cultural team of passionate individuals working together toward one goal: bringing back magic to game development.

How?
â€¢ We get better every day. Our technical abilities should never limit our ideas.
â€¢ We... question the status quo. We don't accept yesterday's answers to tomorrow's challenges.
â€¢ We follow our moral compass. Our values guide our decisions.
â€¢ We surround ourselves with people who believe in our mission. Our staff, clients, and partners are all part of the equation.
â€¢ We learn and share. We want our successes and failures to contribute to the collective wisdom of our profession.

Wizcorp offers a friendly and honest working environment. Our work is challenging but rewarding, with countless personal and professional growth opportunities.

Typical day ğŸ®ğŸ“†ğŸ•¹ï¸

You might start with an hour of looking over some code with a senior engineer. You then might have the opportunity to look at optimizing a piece of AI logic, discussing as necessary with a specialist in the area. In the afternoon you may spend some time working with game designers and artists to complete feature integration.

The ideal candidate will be able to
â€¢ Design, test, and debug own code without assistance from other engineers
â€¢ Break down features into engineering tasks and work with other engineers to complete them
â€¢ Have an interest in working on both games and their surrounding tooling
â€¢ Confidently communicate with all members of the company

Roles and Responsibilities ğŸ› ï¸ğŸ§ªâœ¨
â€¢ Complete assigned engineering tasks in a timely manner
â€¢ Test and document provided solutions to allow other developers to review and learn
â€¢ Write clear, maintainable code that passes review by senior engineers
â€¢ Estimate own tasks and deliver them in a timely manner
â€¢ Raise all blockers when they arise to the feature lead or project lead
â€¢ Follow software engineering best practices for the full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, and testing
â€¢ Take ownership of medium-sized features by breaking them into manageable tasks that can be accomplished by themselves and/or others
â€¢ Coordinate with members outside of the engineering team to deliver features in a timely manner

Application process ğŸˆ¸âš™ï¸ğŸ˜Š

â‘  Online selection

We review resumes from all applicants within 2 weeks. If your profile matches our requirements, we will send you tests and challenges. Based on the results, we will contact you again to schedule the first interview.

â‘¡ Interviews

We conduct three interviews to assess your character, passions, skills, and interest in what we do. We also take the time to share our vision and values, as we believe you are interviewing us as much as we are interviewing you.

â‘¢ Offer

We make our final decision within 2 weeks after the final interview, and send a detailed offer upon success.

Onboarding process ğŸˆ´ğŸ—¼ğŸŒ…

We strive to make the onboarding process as smooth and worry-free as possible.

Upon acceptance of our offer, you will receive our working agreement and our rules of employment.

Ideally, we want you to join us within a month, but we can adjust to your current work situation.

On your first day, your manager will introduce you to your team and will set a schedule for reviews over the 6 month probation period. We will give you all the support you need to complete it successfully.

At Wizcorp, we grow together.

Senior staff will support you and provide mentorship. You will also have access to digital learning material, and your manager will help you define a training curriculum based on your career aspirations.

You can learn more about our career philosophy here: https://www.wizcorp.jp/career

Requirements

ğŸ¤¹ Skillset ğŸ¤¹
â€¢ Strong software development fundamentals, design theory, and development processes
â€¢ Excellent debugging skills
â€¢ Excellent written and verbal communication
â€¢ Willingness to work as part of a team and contribute to technical discussions
â€¢ Eager to learn from reviews and constructive feedback
â€¢ Strong personal time management

â­ Experience â­
â€¢ University degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related discipline; or relevant professional experience
â€¢ 3+ years professional software engineering experience
â€¢ Demonstrable Software Engineering ability
â€¢ Experience with Git or other version control system
â€¢ Experience with multiple programming languages
â€¢ TOEIC 788 or equivalent

ğŸ‘ Preferred ğŸ‘
â€¢ Must have experience with C++ backed up with C# or Go
â€¢ Experience with game engines such as Unity, Unreal, or proprietary engine code
â€¢ Understanding of 2D and 3D math
â€¢ At least one year of experience in the video game industry
â€¢ JLPT N3 or equivalent

Benefits

ğŸ“ Business hours and Location ğŸ“

â² Flexibility in time

We all have different creative clocks, and you know yours better than we do.

We will expect you to work 8 hours per day from Monday to Friday with core hours between 11:00 and 16:00 (excluding a 1-hour break). The rest will be up to you.

ğŸŒ Flexibility in location

Wizcorp fully embraces telework, and most of us work from home. Office space is also available for your convenience, and you will have access to meeting rooms and hot desks.

We may require you to work onsite in specific occasions when using highly specialized equipment.

Offices are located at 1 Chome-22-19 Izumi 8~9F, Suginami City, Tokyo 168-0063 (ğŸ—º map)

You must reside in Japan during your employment at Wizcorp. We offer legal support for visa applications. Depending on your situation, we may allow you to work outside of Japan during your probation period.

ğŸ‘· Employment Type ğŸ‘·â€â™€ï¸

Permanent

ğŸ’´ Salary ğŸ’´

The following tiers are currently in application for this position:
â€¢ SE1: 350~400K/month (equivalent to 2-3 years of experience)
â€¢ SE2: 400~500K/month (equivalent to 4-5 years of experience)
â€¢ SE3: 500~550K/month (equivalent to 6-7 years of experience)

All new staff membersâ€™ initial salary will be based on experience and interview evaluation.

Includes a 6 months probation period. Salary is not affected nor changed during that period.

ğŸ’¹ Raises and bonuses ğŸ’¹
â€¢ You will be reviewed once a year and your salary will be adjusted to match with gained experience and project contributions.
â€¢ Pay raises are awarded around October or November each year, in line with our budget and financial forecasting for the subsequent year.
â€¢ We do not offer bonuses.

ğŸˆ·ï¸ Additional benefits ğŸˆ·ï¸
â€¢ Monthly allowance for home office equipment and supplies (15,000 JPY/month)
â€¢ Private language tutoring (Japanese and/or English)
â€¢ Commute fees (however, train passes are not reimbursed)

â™¨ï¸ Holidays and vacations â™¨ï¸
â€¢ Weekends and national holidays
â€¢ Summer/winter vacation: 5 days per year (paid, applicable after the probation period)
â€¢ Annual Paid Leave: 10 days per year (first year, following the probation period)
â€¢ Bereavement/funeral leave
â€¢ Sick leave: 5 days per year (paid, applicable after the probation period)

ğŸ¤ Welfare ğŸ¤
â€¢ Social insurance
â€¢ Parental leave (learn more here

title: Embedded software development engineer
description:
Renesas is one of the top global semiconductor companies in the world. We strive to develop a safer, healthier, greener, and smarter world, and our goal is to make every endpoint intelligent by offering product solutions in the automotive, industrial, infrastructure and IoT markets. Our robust product portolio includes world-leading MCUs, SoCs, analog and power products, plus Winning Combination solutions that curate these complementary products. We are a key supplier to the worldâ€™s leading manufacturers of the electronics you rely on every day; you may not see our products, but they are all around you.

Renesas employs roughly 21,000 people in more than 30 countries worldwide. As a global team, our employees actively embody the Renesas Culture, our guiding principles based on five key elements: Transparent, Agile, Global, Innovative, and Entrepreneurial. Renesas believes in, and has a commitment to, diversity and inclusion, with initiatives and a leadership team dedicated to its... resources and values. At Renesas, we want to build a sustainable future where technology helps make our lives easier. Join us and build your future by being part of whatâ€™s next in electronics and the world.

Background of Recruitment:

With the increasing demand for IoT devices, it is essential to provide software platforms that include not only drivers but also various middleware (wired/wireless communication, cloud connection, security, HMI, sensing, etc.). We are looking for engineers who understand modern development methods to develop high quality software in a short period of time.

We are looking for an engineer with experience in embedded software development to take charge of software platform development and be a leader in the future.

Responsibilities:

Software developmnt of microcontollers software-platform (Drivers & Middleware) for IoT deveices.

The following activities will be the main tasks:

- Development of drivers for Renesas microcontoller's peripherals

- Development of middleware for IoT devices (e.g. Connectibity, Security/Crypto)

- Improvement of development process using CI/CD system

Required Skills and Work Experience:

MUST

- Experience in embedded software development using C language.

- Experience in software development using CI/CD system.

- Ability to prepare documents to be provided to customers.

WANT

- Experience in using and developing Linux and real-time OS (uITRON, FreeRTOS, etc.)

- Experience in setting up CI/CD systems

Required Language Skills:

Japanese: business level

English: be able to understand spoken English

We strive to develop a safer, healthier, greener, and smarter world, and our goal is to make every endpoint intelligent by offering product solutions in the automotive, industrial, infrastructure and IoT markets. Our robust product portolio includes world-leading MCUs, SoCs, analog and power products, plus Winning Combination solutions that curate these complementary products. We are a key supplier to the worldâ€™s leading manufacturers of the electronics you rely on every day; you may not see our products, but they are all around you.

Renesas employs roughly 21,000 people in more than 30 countries worldwide. As a global team, our employees actively embody the Renesas Culture, our guiding principles based on five key elements: Transparent, Agile, Global, Innovative, and Entrepreneurial. Renesas believes in, and has a commitment to, diversity and inclusion, with initiatives and a leadership team dedicated to its... resources and values. At Renesas, we want to build a sustainable future where technology helps make our lives easier. Join us and build your future by being part of whatâ€™s next in electronics and the world.

Background of Recruitment:

With the increasing demand for IoT devices, it is essential to provide software platforms that include not only drivers but also various middleware (wired/wireless communication, cloud connection, security, HMI, sensing, etc.). We are looking for engineers who understand modern development methods to develop high quality software in a short period of time.

We are looking for an engineer with experience in embedded software development to take charge of software platform development and be a leader in the future.

Responsibilities:

Software developmnt of microcontollers software-platform (Drivers & Middleware) for IoT deveices.

The following activities will be the main tasks:

- Development of drivers for Renesas microcontoller's peripherals

- Development of middleware for IoT devices (e.g. Connectibity, Security/Crypto)

- Improvement of development process using CI/CD system

Required Skills and Work Experience:

MUST

- Experience in embedded software development using C language.

- Experience in software development using CI/CD system.

- Ability to prepare documents to be provided to customers.

WANT

- Experience in using and developing Linux and real-time OS (uITRON, FreeRTOS, etc.)

- Experience in setting up CI/CD systems

Required Language Skills:

Japanese: business level

English: be able to understand spoken English

title: Senior Backend Software Engineer
description:
To accelerate our the development of our product Weave, we are looking for a highly motivated professional who can lead the development of backend including algorithms and APIs for our solutions.

As one of our initial core members of product development team, you will play a critical role in proactively collaborating with our product and corporate teams to ensure a successful launch of our solution as an open architecture accounting for data accessibility.
This presents a unique opportunity to establish a foundation for your career growth, as you will have the chance to expand your responsibilities in line with your professional aspirations while meeting the needs of our dynamic teams.

Tech Stack
â€¢ Backend: Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, Amazon DynamoDB, Python, TypeScript
â€¢ Frontend: Next.js, TypeScript
â€¢ Infrastructure: AWS, Azure

Responsibilities
â€¢ Lead the development of Weaveâ€™s backend (DB, server, API, etc.)
â€¢ Development of optimization applications for users (pilots and... dispatchers) involved in flight operations
â€¢ Work with the front-end and algorithm team to build a system that allows more optimal linkage and calculation of vast amounts of data, and develop APIs in preparation for linkage with front-end and external systems

Requirements
â€¢ 3+ years of experience leading the back-end side of software product development
â€¢ Experience in web application development as a back-end engineer with one or more strengths in related areas. For example:
â€¢ Building back-end infrastructure (e.g. with AWS, using these technologies: AWS S3, AWS dynamo DB, AWS CDK, AWS Cognito, AWS Lambda)
â€¢ Building and implementing back-end and front-end monitoring
â€¢ Experience implementing payment systems using Stripe, etc.
â€¢ Development experience using languages such as Python, React/Next.js, TypeScript, etc.
â€¢ Agile/Scrum experience

Nice to haves

These arenâ€™t required, but be sure to mention them in your application if you have them.
â€¢ iOS or Android application development experience

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
The Opportunity

We are currently seeking a highly proficient Senior Software Engineer to solve technical issues from Unity users and work with the Global R&D team to research and improve Unity engine native codes.

Our customers have a wide variety of problems, which require quick thinking as well as in-depth analysis. This is where you step in and work to solve these problems with curiosity, flexibility and positivity. In return, you will be constantly learning about the latest features of Unity, and get to help nurture some of the most exciting games and applications in development today!

What youâ€™ll be doing

â€¢ Efficiently provide technical support and solutions across Unityâ€™s deployment platforms and variety of applications
â€¢ Solve customer problems via online ticketing and any other appropriate communication medium
â€¢ Collaborate with your colleagues to ensure team success
â€¢ Maintain excellent relations between the Engine Support team and other departments within Unity

What... weâ€™re looking for

â€¢ In-depth knowledge of graphics programming (e.g. Universal Render Pipeline, Shader Programming, VFX Graph)
â€¢ Experience in the developing and the shipping products using Unity
â€¢ High level of understanding of Unity Engine features (e.g. DOTS, Unity Physics, Addressable...)
â€¢ Passionate about fixing problems and solving technical issues
â€¢ Strong oral and written communication skills (in both Japanese and English) with various groups of customers and internal teams

You might also have

â€¢ Experience in the developing and the shipping on AR/VR/console game (Playstation5/Nintendo Switch)/Steam platform project
â€¢ Experience in the developing and the shipping product not using Unity
â€¢ Experience in the networking programming

International relocation support is not available for this position.
Immigration - Work visa/immigration sponsorship is not available for this position

Life at Unity

Unity (NYSE: U) is the worldâ€™s leading platform for creating and operating real-time 3D (RT3D) content. Creators, ranging from game developers to artists, architects, automotive designers, filmmakers, and others, use Unity to make their imaginations come to life. Unity is the foundation upon which the worldâ€™s most powerful digital content is created. Specifically, Unityâ€™s platform provides a comprehensive set of software solutions to create, run and monetize interactive, real-time 2D and 3D content for mobile phones, tablets, PCs, consoles, and augmented and virtual reality devices.

In the fourth quarter of 2022, more than 70% of the top 1000 mobile games were made with Unity as derived from a blended number of the top 1000 games in the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. In 2022, Made with Unity Applications had more than 4 billion downloads per month. For more information, please visit www.unity.com.

Unity is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive, innovative environment with the best employees. Therefore, we provide employment opportunities without regard to age, race, color, ancestry, national origin, disability, gender, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable law. If there are preparations or accommodations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please fill out this form to let us know.

Headhunters and recruitment agencies may not submit resumes/CVs through this website or directly to managers. Unity does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Unity will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Unity.

Your privacy is important to us. Please take a moment to review our Prospect and Applicant Privacy Policies. Should you have any concerns about your privacy, please contact us at DPO@unity.com.

#LI-CW2 #SEN

title: 2024Graduates(Software Engineer)
description:
2024Graduates(Software Engineer)

ä»•äº‹æ¦‚è¦

We're hiring software engineers interested in digitizing the wide range of industries that Mitsubishi Corporation involves!

MC Digital is a technology company established in September 2019 with investment from Mitsubishi Corporation. MC Digital will be responsible for new business planning and new service product development for Mitsubishi Corporation.

Since Mitsubishi Corporation handles a wide range of industries (industrial plants, logistics, energy, retail, food, healthcare, urban development, mobility, electric power, chemicals, metal resources, etc.), the ability to deal with a wide range of industries is required. In addition to development, you will be required to enter into projects from the planning stage of new business with Mitsubishi Corporation's new business managers.

The work will include back-end development. Specifically, this includes back-end development during the development of new projects, as well as the construction... of data infrastructure and APIs for machine learning projects. From upstream, you will consider the customer experience from the customer's perspective, create prototypes, and actually implement them at the production level. Everything we develop will be built as a microservice that communicates through APIs for scalable development; we will build the application on Kubernetes to allow us the freedom to choose the best technology.

[Job duties]
ãƒ»Design, development, and operation of APIs and web applications using Golang, Node, Ruby, and Python
ãƒ»Planning and technical feasibility proposal for new projects
ãƒ»Design, development, and operation of APIs and data infrastructure for machine learning projects
ãƒ»Lead team development
There are also opportunities to utilize AtCoder experience, such as building algorithms for linear programming optimization.

[About us]
We are a small yet diverse elite group - that includes a top ranker in the Kaggle, a medalist from the International Science Olympiad, and a doctoral degree holder.

From upstream, you will consider the customer experience from the customer's perspective, create prototypes, and actually implement them at the production level. Everything we develop will be built as a microservice that communicates through APIs for scalable development; we will build the application on Kubernetes to allow us the freedom to choose the best technology.

[Job duties]

ãƒ»Planning and technical feasibility proposal for new projects
ãƒ»Design, development, and operation of APIs and data infrastructure for machine learning projects
ãƒ»Lead team development
There are also opportunities to utilize AtCoder experience, such as building algorithms for linear programming optimization.

[About us]
We are a small yet diverse elite group - that includes a top ranker in the Kaggle, a medalist from the International Science Olympiad, and a doctoral degree holder.

title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer for Robotics System Safety
description:
As a Senior Embedded Software Engineer for Robotics System Safety, you will develop embedded software for functional safety system. You will design several software components related to functional safety. And also you will develop SW architecture and system design to comply with the functional safety standard. And you will work closely with several development teams(hardware, software, robotics, and testing) to ensure designs are implemented, verified, and validated according to system requirements and safety targets.

You will have the chance to play an important role from the beginning of the design phase for a product and see the whole process of how a new product is born.

The ideal candidate must have demonstrable experience and expertise in
â€¢ Real-Time Operating Systems, ideally in Zephyr and/or Linux.
â€¢ C/C++.
â€¢ Embedded Systems Design.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Development of low-level functional safety framework on RTOS.
â€¢ Development of network communication program with safety... protocol.
â€¢ Development of network communication program with safety protocol.
â€¢ Evaluate software architectural performance for safety system to realize required safety functions.
â€¢ Create test programs of verification and validation on functional safety system and support to execute those tests.
â€¢ Work with cross-functional teams(FW/HW/Robotics/Testing) on functional safety topics.

Required Skills & Experience
â€¢ Bachelor's degree or higher in Electronics or computer engineering.
â€¢ 5+ years of work experience with SW implementation and verification for functional safety systems.
â€¢ Strong background in C/C++ programming and low-level driver experience.
â€¢ Strong understanding of multicore hardware, operating systems design, concurrency, interrupts, device drivers and real-time programming.
â€¢ Experience of network programming skills on industry network.
â€¢ Experience of SW/FW development process using verification/validation activities within standards such as IEC 61508.
â€¢ Busines level English.

Perferred Skills & Experience
â€¢ Experience designing industrial devices, especially industrial PCs
â€¢ Expert in real-time OS, Linux kernel module development.
â€¢ Deep understanding of safety protocol based on IEC 61508 and IEC 61784-3.
â€¢ Experience of static code analysis such as coverity, parasoft, etc.

Relocation Support

If you relocate from outside of Japan, we will provide the following support.
â€¢ One-way flight to Japan
â€¢ Shipping expenses with cap
â€¢ Temporary housing assist
â€¢ Permanent housing assist
â€¢ Visa application support

Holidays
â€¢ Two full days off per a week (Saturday, Sunday)
â€¢ Holidays scheduled on the Companyâ€™s calendar
â€¢ 10 Paid Leaves in first year
â€¢ Congratulation/Condolence, Maternity/Childcare, Family Caregiver Leave

Company Befients
â€¢ Visa Support
â€¢ Commuting Allowance
â€¢ Social Insurance
â€¢ No dress code
â€¢ Free lunch, drinks, coffee, and snack, etc.
â€¢ Gym facilities in the office.

General Information
â€¢ Work Place: 3-8-5 Tatsumi, Koto-ku, Tokyo, 135-0053 Japan
â€¢ Work Hours: 8:45 -17:45(includes one hour breaking

title: Senior Software Engineer for Industrial Robotics (C++, Python)
description:
We work in a fast-paced, agile environment where we constantly collaborate, review ideas amongst peers, and test proposed solutions. We encourage continuous learning and brainstorming of ideas within the team!

As a Senior Robotics Software Engineer, you will be a key member of our Robotics System Team and will be responsible for leading algorithmic design, development, and deployment of cutting-edge robotics technologies.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Lead the development of motion planning, control, and system design of industrial robots applications, and solve cutting-edge scientific and technical challenges.
â€¢ Design, develop, and test motion planning and control algorithms for industrial robots to execute various tasks, highly concurrent software systems, and real-time communication modules with robot controllers and peripheral devices in C/C++.
â€¢ Lead the deployment of Mujin systems at customer sites, ensuring successful implementation and integration.
â€¢ Mentor and guide junior team... members, providing technical leadership and direction.
â€¢ Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to identify and address technical challenges, and contribute to the development of innovative solutions.

Minimum Requirements
â€¢ Advanced degree in computer science, robotics, or related fields.
â€¢ 5+ years of work experience in robotics or software engineering.
â€¢ Strong proficiency in C++.
â€¢ Experience using linear algebra and 3D geometry to solve engineering problems.
â€¢ Experience with Linux.
â€¢ Strong passion to make robotics systems to be used in production.

Preferable Requirements
â€¢ Proven experience in developing concurrent and hierarchical robotic software systems such as ROS.
â€¢ Experience leading software development in small to medium-scale teams.
â€¢ In-depth knowledge of multi-joint robot hardware.
â€¢ Advanced Linux user.
â€¢ Mathematical background such as multibody dynamics, collision checking, search algorithms, and optimization.

Attractiveness
â€¢ We are focused on solving real-world problems and your contributions are deployed quickly to empower industrial robots to perform tasks that were previously impossible.
â€¢ Our team members come from specialized areas in robotics and have achieved degrees from top-tier universities such as Nanyang Technological University, Carnegie Mellon University, and MIT, and some have won top prizes in robotics competitions.
â€¢ We use "machine intelligence" to make our robots intelligent. It's a fusion of real-time motion planning, perception, simulation, and control technologies. Read it here.
â€¢ As a Senior Robotics Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge robotics technologies, mentor junior team members, and contribute to the development of innovative solutions. We are looking for a passionate and experienced individual who can lead the development of advanced robotics software systems.

Work Location

Tokyo HQ: 3-8-5 Tatsumi, Koto-ku, Tokyo, 135-0053 Japan

Working Hours

8:45ï½17:45 (Includes 1-hour break)

Holidays
â€¢ 2 full days off per week (Saturday, Sunday)
â€¢ Holidays scheduled on the Companyâ€™s calendar
â€¢ Paid Leaves
â€¢ Congratulation/Condolence, Maternity/Childcare, Family Caregiver Leave

Expected Salary
â€¢ Flexible depending on experience and skills

Benefits
â€¢ Commuting Allowance
â€¢ Social Insurance
â€¢ No dress code (You can dress casually)
â€¢ Buffet lunch (Free)
â€¢ Drinks and Snacks (Free) / High-end coffee machine (Free)
â€¢ Gym facilities in the office

title: Software Engineer (Japan)
description:
Want to live and work in Japan? We are looking for full-stack software engineers from around the world who have a strong motivation to come to Japan. From VISA support and guidance, to help adjusting to the unique Japanese culture, we have specialised in helping the worldâ€™s talent move to Japan by the 100s for over 5 years. Weâ€™d love to help you too!

Detailed responsibilities will vary from product to product, team to team; however, in general we are looking for experienced software engineers to get involved in Agile development following modern engineering principles. Japanese language ability is usually not necessary, because you would be working in diverse teams who work in English.

Teams & Projects:
â€¢ Computer vision XaaS, working on AR and cloud technologies
â€¢ Blockchain solution to power smart contracts, payments, logistics and more
â€¢ Marketing and AdTech solutions powered by data science
â€¢ Smart city, automated space mapping, and self-driving cars
â€¢ Plus, many more.

Required... skills:
â€¢ At least 2 years of professional experience in software engineering
â€¢ Strong grasp of web engineering principles (e.g. APIs, messaging, datastores, etc)
â€¢ Modern programming language fluency (we have products in Java, Python, Go, Rust, C++, Typescript, Kotlin, etc)
â€¢ Experience with source control, versioning, CI, and working in a modern engineering team
â€¢ Experience with containerization, orchestration, service mesh, cloud computing and so on (nice to have)
â€¢ Good communication skills in English (Japanese nice to have but not necessary)

Other Important Points:
â€¢ Flexitime, work-from-home and other working styles available (note: remote work from outside Japan not allowed)
â€¢ Salary ranges from 4M to 18M depending on seniority
â€¢ VISA support, health insurance, employment insurance, pension, and other benefits provided

We only work with teams and projects that we know treat people well from years of track record. I hope you are now curious about working in tech in Japan! If so, please feel free to reach our manager Daniel Bamford by Linkedin or email to daniel.bamford@robertwalters.co.jp and he will help talk you through all the details and next steps. You may also click on the Apply button, and apply to one of the vacancies on our website. Then we would follow up with you to talk about all of the different options. We hope to help you soon, and then welcome you to Japan

title: Backend Engineer - Japan
description:
About Us Eagle Eye Networks is the global leader in cloud video surveillance, delivering cyber-secure, cloud-based video with artificial intelligence (AI) and analytics to make businesses more efficient and the world a safer place.

The Eagle Eye Cloud VMS (video management system) is the only platform robust and flexible enough to power the future of video surveillance and intelligence.

Eagle Eye is based in Austin, Texas, with offices in Amsterdam, Bangalore, and Tokyo. Learn more at een.com . Eagle Eye Engineering Our full stack engineering teams take products from ideation through development and deployment.

Businesses all over the world trust us to operate in real time as our solutions gather, process, view and add insight to petabytes of real time video all hosted in our own secure data centers.

No matter if you wish to develop lightweight microservices, ground breaking AI or delightful web or mobile user experiences, we have a challenge for you.

Summary As a Backend... Engineer your passion for building scalable microservices and APIs will enable you to play a key role in the design, development and overall product life cycle of Eagle Eagle Eye Networkâ€™s flagship video security services and applications.

As an individual contributor on our Agile delivery teams you will be charged with engineering back end solutions to challenging global scale problems and in turn creating well designed and delightful user experiences that deliver those capabilities in real-time to users all over the world.

A start-up mindset is required as we are always looking for creative ways to take on and solve new challenges in our relentless quest to deliver solutions to real world customer problems.

Experience 5+ Years of experience building and delivering cloud based services and applications in a CI / CD environment via containerization technologies including Docker and Kubernetes Proven mastery of modern managed languages, primarily TypeScript, and optionally with Python or Go Familiarity with backing stores and databases including both SQL / NoSQL such as Postgres and Redis History of delivering products built on multiple frameworks such as Express or Django.

Demonstrated ability to not only code, but also define, document, debug and maintain full stack applications An Agile mentality is required as we strive every sprint to design, code, test and deliver solutions to our customers and in turn react and pivot based upon their feedback Understanding and expertise in the security, surveillance or IoT domains is a huge plus Excellent oral and written communication skills.

Should be Equally capable of clarifying design points with architects and product owners as well as working with customer service to solve customer problems Why work for Eagle Eye?

Eagle Eye Networks is an innovative, global start-up building the only platform powerful enough to support the future of video surveillance and security.

Here your voice will be heard, and talent respected. We have proven leadership and financial backing of one of the worldâ€™s premier venture capital firms.

The work we do is essential in todayâ€™s world, as our systems are used to protect the health, safety, and welfare of people and property around the world.

Eagle Eye is a place where you can make a difference. Bring your passion, your drive, a roll-up- your- sleeves- and- get- it- done work ethic, and a collaborative mindset.

Be ready to work hard and have fun. We also have great benefits and perks. Culture : Innovation drives our vibe. Diversity : We embrace our global presence, the diverse ideas and backgrounds of our team to improve our culture, our products and grow our people and our business More About Eagle Eye Networks Eagle Eye Networks is leveraging artificial intelligence on its true cloud platform to dramatically reshape the video surveillance and security industry.

The Eagle Eye Cloud Video Management System (VMS) is a smart cloud video surveillance solution, purpose-built to help businesses improve safety, security, operations, and customer service.

Tens of thousands of companies in more than 90 countries around the globe have moved their video surveillance to the cloud with Eagle Eye VMS.

Customers, including multi-family residences, smart cities, schools, hospitals, hotels, logistics, restaurants, and retail shops trust Eagle Eye for actionable business intelligence and proactive security across multiple locations.

The Eagle Eye VMS has strong APIs for the secure integration of third-party systems and works with thousands of industry cameras, so customers donâ€™t have to rip and replace their existing infrastructure.

Eagle Eye Cloud VMS is the only platform robust enough to power the future of video surveillance. Eagle Eye Networks is an equal employment opportunity employer and values diversity.

Qualified candidates are considered for employment without regard to race, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, military or veteran status, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. Powered by JazzHR

title: Embedded Platform Software Engineer
description:
About Our Client

Our client is a European software company, headquartered in Finland. They develop GUI and provide platform for embedded software developers in world's most important industries such as automotive, ship, satellite, etc. The company is gaining a strong presence globally. Company culture is very international and flexible. Their benefits include career growth support, remote work, flex time, etc.

Job Description

You will act as customer lead and software developer for company's embedded software development platform.

Your responsibilities includes:
â€¢ Work closely with clients to solve their issues and ensure success in the project
â€¢ Become a key technical person participating in customer workshops and giving guidance on their software architecture
â€¢ Collaborate with Professional Services team and the R&D.

The Successful Applicant

Must have
â€¢ Professional experience in software development, especially in C++ and embedded platforms.
â€¢ Good communication skill in... Japanese and English
â€¢ Ability to travel to client site

Prefer to have
â€¢ Qt & QML experiences
â€¢ Understanding computer graphics is an additional plus

What's on Offer
â€¢ Hybrid remote work
â€¢ Flexible and international environment
â€¢ Career growth support program
â€¢ Work life balance support such as no-overtime policy, gym membership, flex time system, etc.
â€¢ Ability to contribute to cutting edge technology and product

title: Lead Software Engineer, Full Stack (Remote)
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â€¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

About the Job

Note: Agodaâ€™s hybrid workplace includes a few select remote roles and in-office roles. By applying to this position you will have an opportunity to share your preferred working location from the following:

In-office locations: Gurugram, India; Bangkok, Thailand.

Full Remote location(s): Bangalore, India; Pune, India; Tokyo, Japan.

Get to Know our Team:

The Full Stack Engineering Department builds the Agoda web and app products. We have several teams in... front-end focusing on different aspects of our products including accommodations, flights, payments, marketing, post-booking services, and more. Agodaâ€™s marketplace is the world. We build localized and optimized user experiences at scale on every major internet platform. These include our mobile websites, native apps, and desktop sites. We hire people from around the world who have a passion for using technology to create and implement the best user experiences. Our teams work on the full stack and build end-to-end systems including user interfaces, APIs, backend systems, and database systems. Our products are always evolving and under experimentation. We accomplish this by having an amazing degree of automation, CI/CD systems, and use a modularized approach. As we are data driven and measure our results, we continually innovate and improve our work. We are looking for the next great talent who strives to learn and grow and has a standard of excellence, strong sense of ownership, and great technical skills.

The Opportunity:

Lead Software Engineer is the a role in our technology organization working together with individual contributors and senior leadership. Our Lead engineers are heavily involved in the hiring and mentoring process and are the go-to people who design and implement new systems and components. We are looking for people who are passionate to take on more responsibility and driving major architectural changes in Agoda. Itâ€™s expected from you in this role as Lead Software Engineer to push Agoda forward technically by adopting new technologies and setting higher standards.

In this Role, you'll get to:
â€¢ Maintain ownership and responsibility of mission critical systems
â€¢ Be hands on â€“ build high volume platforms using cutting-edge technologies like React and GraphQL
â€¢ Mentor and coach other software engineers
â€¢ Be a major contributor to our agile and scrum practices
â€¢ Design and lead crucial technical projects and initiatives cross teams and departments
â€¢ Stay on the leading edge of technical know-how, industry trends and drive technical innovations

What you'll Need to Succeed:
â€¢ 8 years of experience developing web applications in client-side frameworks such as React, Angular, VueJS
â€¢ A bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a quantitative field is required; a master's degree is preferred. Alternatively, a minimum of 10 years of experience in the relevant field is acceptable
â€¢ Working experience with agile, analytics, A/B testing and/or feature flags, Continuous Delivery, Trunk-based Development
â€¢ Excellent HTML/CSS skills â€“ you understand not only how to build the data, but how to make it look great too
â€¢ Excellent understanding of object-oriented JavaScript, TypeScript
â€¢ You love new technologies and approaches and want to use the best tools available. We want people who can help us continually evolve our stack.
â€¢ Great communication and coordination skills
â€¢ Excellent analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
â€¢ You have a good command of the English language.

It's Great if you have:
â€¢ Knowledge in physical architecture at scale, building resilient, no single point of failures, highly available solutions
â€¢ Knowledge in one or more of the following: NoSQL technologies (Cassandra, ScyllaDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, DynamoDB, etc), Queueing system experience (Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, Azure Service Bus, etc.)
â€¢ Working Experience with Containers and Dockerization, also K8S is a plus
â€¢ Knowledge and hands on experience in CI/CD solutions would be a plus
â€¢ Strong experience in all aspects of client-side performance optimization
â€¢ Extremely proficient in modern coding and design practices. For example, Clean Code, SOLID principals, and TDD
â€¢ Experience in multiple front-end platforms including iOS, Android, Web, and API services
â€¢ Have worked on an app or internet company that is at scale with large numbers of users and transactions per second
â€¢ Have experience in a data driven company with experience analyzing and working with Big Data
â€¢ Lead teams and greenfield projects solving large system problems
â€¢ Worked on global projects serving world markets with distributed data centers and localization of the front end and data

#Tokyo #LI-Remote

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a personâ€™s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy.

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes

As we are data driven and measure our results, we continually innovate and improve our work. We are looking for the next great talent who strives to learn and grow and has a standard of excellence, strong sense of ownership, and great technical skills.

The Opportunity:

Lead Software Engineer is the a role in our technology organization working together with individual contributors and senior leadership. Our Lead engineers are heavily involved in the hiring and mentoring process and are the go-to people who design and implement new systems and components. We are looking for people who are passionate to take on more responsibility and driving major architectural changes in Agoda. Itâ€™s expected from you in this role as Lead Software Engineer to push Agoda forward technically by adopting new technologies and setting higher standards.

In this Role, you'll get to:
â€¢ Maintain ownership and responsibility of mission critical systems
â€¢ Be hands on â€“ build high volume platforms using cutting-edge technologies like React and GraphQL
â€¢ Mentor and coach other software engineers
â€¢ Be a major contributor to our agile and scrum practices
â€¢ Design and lead crucial technical projects and initiatives cross teams and departments
â€¢ Stay on the leading edge of technical know-how, industry trends and drive technical innovations

What you'll Need to Succeed:
â€¢ 8 years of experience developing web applications in client-side frameworks such as React, Angular, VueJS
â€¢ A bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a quantitative field is required; a master's degree is preferred. Alternatively, a minimum of 10 years of experience in the relevant field is acceptable
â€¢ Working experience with agile, analytics, A/B testing and/or feature flags, Continuous Delivery, Trunk-based Development
â€¢ Excellent HTML/CSS skills â€“ you understand not only how to build the data, but how to make it look great too
â€¢ Excellent understanding of object-oriented JavaScript, TypeScript
â€¢ You love new technologies and approaches and want to use the best tools available. We want people who can help us continually evolve our stack.
â€¢ Great communication and coordination skills
â€¢ Excellent analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
â€¢ You have a good command of the English language.

It's Great if you have:
â€¢ Knowledge in physical architecture at scale, building resilient, no single point of failures, highly available solutions
â€¢ Knowledge in one or more of the following: NoSQL technologies (Cassandra, ScyllaDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, DynamoDB, etc), Queueing system experience (Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQS, Azure Service Bus, etc.)
â€¢ Working Experience with Containers and Dockerization, also K8S is a plus
â€¢ Knowledge and hands on experience in CI/CD solutions would be a plus
â€¢ Strong experience in all aspects of client-side performance optimization
â€¢ Extremely proficient in modern coding and design practices. For example, Clean Code, SOLID principals, and TDD
â€¢ Experience in multiple front-end platforms including iOS, Android, Web, and API services
â€¢ Have worked on an app or internet company that is at scale with large numbers of users and transactions per second
â€¢ Have experience in a data driven company with experience analyzing and working with Big Data
â€¢ Lead teams and greenfield projects solving large system problems
â€¢ Worked on global projects serving world markets with distributed data centers and localization of the front end and data

#Tokyo #LI-Remote

Equal Opportunity Employer

At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a personâ€™s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.

We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy.

To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes

title: Backend Software Engineer
description:
About us

Global leader in cloud video surveillance, delivering cyber-secure, cloud-based video with Artificial Intelligence (AI) and analytics to make businesses more efficient and the world a safer place. The only platform robust and flexible enough to power the future of video surveillance and intelligence. From United States with offices in Amsterdam, Bangalore, and Tokyo.

Job Description

Overview:

As a Backend Engineer your passion for building scalable microservices and APIs will enable you to play a key role in the design, development and overall product life cycle of the flagship services and applications. As an individual contributor on our Agile delivery teams you will be charged with engineering back end solutions to challenging global scale problems and in turn creating well designed and delightful user experiences that deliver those capabilities in real-time to users all over the world. A start-up mindset is required as we are always looking for creative ways to take... on and solve new challenges in our relentless quest to deliver solutions to real world customer problems.

title: Embedded Software Engineer / No.1 share of cab dispatch app in...
description:
-------------------------------------------
Job Description
-------------------------------------------

ã€Project Overviewã€‘
Traffic accident reduction support service that crosses AI and IoT. Based on various data obtained from a dedicated in-vehicle device based on a drive recorder, it automatically detects dangerous scenes that are highly likely to lead to traffic accidents and analyzes driving tendencies.
Combining data obtained from video images inside and outside the vehicle, acceleration sensors, GPS, and other sources, the system visualizes dangerous driving that the driver may not be aware of, such as failing to stop for a moment. It provides reports and real-time alerts such as insufficient distance between vehicles, allowing drivers to identify their own driving habits and slackness.
Launched in June 2019, it has been adopted by many professional sites such as cabs and trucks that require serious driving skills and operation management, and the contracted vehicles are... currently spread across the country, mainly in the Kanto, Chukyo, and Keihanshin areas. In recognition of its functionality and track record, it has also been adopted by the Tokyo Metropolitan Government for its "Drive Recorder Monitoring Project with AI.

ã€Your Roleã€‘
The company will develop and operate software for in-vehicle cameras used in this service.
Specifically, you will be involved in the development of accident reduction functions that operate on in-vehicle cameras, the implementation of AI, and the development of new functions to meet customer needs.
In the development of in-vehicle cameras, you will also be involved in the realization of necessary functions in cooperation with hardware vendors.
This job is characterized by the wide range of development required.
The basic development language is Java/Kotlin, but efficient development is required using various development languages such as Python because of the need to introduce and port AI-related content.
In addition, hardware development, production, and operation require a team to work with hardware vendors and production plants to address complex requirements and provide hardware to customers.

-------------------------------------------
Required Skills
-------------------------------------------

ã€Requiredã€‘
ãƒ»Experience in development and operation of applications using Java / Kotlin
ãƒ»Experience in development, operation and maintenance using Linux / Android environment

ã€Preferredã€‘
ãƒ»Experience in embedded software development using C/C++ language
ãƒ»Experience with Android framework development
ãƒ»Experience with Linux driver development
ãƒ»Experience using languages such as Python
ãƒ»Experience in team development using Git

ã€Ideal Applicantsã€‘
ãƒ»Willing to use development languages, frameworks, and libraries that they have never used before.
ãƒ»Commitment to the service itself, not just the technology, based on a sense of empathy for the evolution of the mobility field and its contribution to society.
ãƒ»Able to act on their own with a "broad perspective," a "long view," and "flexibility.
ãƒ»Continuously strive to improve required skills
ãƒ»Communicate with respect for others
ãƒ»Able to solve new problems from a variety of perspectives

-------------------------------------------
Location
-------------------------------------------

Tokyo

-------------------------------------------
Contract Type
-------------------------------------------

Fulltime

-------------------------------------------
Annual Salary
-------------------------------------------

600 Million yen ~ 1,200 Million yen

title: Software Engineer, Server/Backend
description:
Niantic is seeking Software Engineers to help build next-generation augmented reality and location-based games using Nianticâ€™s Real World Platform.

The ideal candidate has a love for games and the ability to collaborate with Unity developers, technical artists, and game designers in order to build fun games at scale. We seek engineers with strong judgment, great execution, and a willingness to take on new responsibilities. You will work on all aspects of the game backend, from designing RPC protocols to writing game logic to deploying and monitoring the servers. Building systems with security and scalability in mind is a must.

Our focus is shipping fun, world-class games. We value engineers who consistently deliver quality results. You will join an outstanding team of like-minded people to create cutting-edge mobile and AR experiences.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Create robust, low-latency, scalable systems that support Nianticâ€™s products.
â€¢ Design the RPC protocols and implement... server-side features in Java.
â€¢ Collaborate with other engineers, product managers, and other departments to ensure code meets internal standards.
â€¢ Perform load testing, participate in code reviews, write unit tests, and conduct troubleshooting to ensure uptime for live systems.
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional team members and stakeholders, including regular and reliable attendance and participation in meetings.
â€¢ Required in-office 3 days on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday.

Qualifications
â€¢ You have a BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, or a related technical field, or equivalent experience.
â€¢ Minimum of 2+ years of experience building reliable scalable platforms, 5+ years for senior level candidates.
â€¢ Proficiency in one of the following languages: Java, Go or C++.
â€¢ Experience building networked and distributed systems.
â€¢ Experience building concurrent and multi-threaded services.
â€¢ Delivered solutions to production environments, and provided tools to monitor, support and mitigate any issues.
â€¢ Ability to work in a fast-paced hybrid environment and handle stress appropriately and/or ability to solve practical problems and be sufficiently adaptable to handle dynamic situations with little advance notice.
â€¢ Experience working on cross-functional teams with ability to communicate effectively through written and verbal communications, including synchronous interactions with others.

Plus Ifâ€¦
â€¢ You have experience with deployment on hosting providers, such as Google Cloud, Azure or AWS.
â€¢ Familiarity with Kubernetes, infrastructure as code (such as Terraform).
â€¢ Experience mentoring junior engineers or leading projects.

Join the Niantic team!

Niantic is the worldâ€™s leading AR technology company, sparking creative and engaging journeys in the real world. Our products inspire outdoor exploration, exercise, and meaningful social interaction.

Originally formed at Google in 2011, we became an independent company in 2015. Some of our current consumer titles include pioneering global-control game Ingress, record-breaking AR game PokÃ©mon GO, and Pikmin Bloom. In November 2021, we launched our developer platform, Lightship, enabling creators to build immersive AR experiences around the globe. Our basketball universe has come to life, as we recently launched one of the most innovative sports games ever, in partnership with the NBA. NBA ALL-World is now live and playable globally! Niantic is an Equal Opportunity employer.

We believe that cultivating a workplace where our people are supported and included is essential to creating great products our community will love. Our mission emphasizes seeking and hiring diverse voices, including those who are traditionally underrepresented in the technology industry, and we consider this to be one of the most important values we hold close.

Niantic is a hybrid first company. We believe that in person interaction and collaboration fosters creativity, a sense of community, and is critical to our future success as a company. Our hybrid work schedules allow for a mix of remote and in-office work.

We're a hard-working, fun, and exciting group who value intellectual curiosity and a passion for problem-solving! We have growing offices located in San Francisco, Sunnyvale, Palo Alto, Bellevue, Los Angeles, Kansas, New York, Miami, London, Tokyo, Hamburg, Hyderabad, and Zurich. #LI-HYBRID

title: Autonomous Driving Simulation Software Engineer - Arene Reactor
description:
Woven by Toyota is the mobility technology subsidiary of Toyota Motor Corporation. Our mission is to deliver safe, intelligent, human-centered mobility for all. Through our Arene mobility software platform, safety-first automated driving technology and Toyota Woven City â€” our test course for advanced mobility â€” weâ€™re bringing greater freedom, safety and happiness to people and society.

Our unique global culture weaves modern Silicon Valley innovation and time-tested Japanese quality craftsmanship. We leverage these complementary strengths to amplify the capabilities of drivers, foster happiness, and elevate well-being.

TEAM

Areneâ€™s goal is to open vehicle programming to everyone by simplifying vehicle software development and increasing deployment frequency without compromising safety and security. This will create a whole new market of vehicle application developers who, through software, integrate a vehicle into our daily lives in novel ways. Arene aims to significantly improve... how vehicles are designed and developed, and weâ€™re working closely with Toyota to realize this goal in its next-generation vehicles.

Arene Reactor team aims to enable developers to test their applications as early as possible in the development cycle without requiring access to a real vehicle to reduce costs and deliver safer software. For this, we provide a highly customizable simulation core engine that simulates sensors and ground-truth data for both the tested vehicle and its surrounding virtual environment. You will report to the Team Lead of Arene Reactor, and the role is onsite

WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR

We are looking for experienced developers who are passionate about developing simulation technology that enables increasingly more powerful self-driving software to safely enter the marketplace. Testing a complex piece of software such as an AD/ADAS system requires carefully engineered automated workflows including ground-breaking simulation technology.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
â€¢ Collaborate with other team members and other Arene teams to develop simulation related software components and tools.
â€¢ Work closely with customers, simulation application developers, to design and deliver solutions that meet their needs.
â€¢ Create self-contained solutions that can be built and deployed in a fully-automated way.
â€¢ Adhere and incrementally improve the norms of the team in communication, workflows, coding standards, etc.
â€¢ Learn about and understand user workflows for simulation and testing.

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:
â€¢ 5+ years experience in object oriented language (modern C++, Pythonâ€¦)
â€¢ Experience with modern development tools (Git, Docker, Jira, Confluenceâ€¦)
â€¢ Experience with maintaining and deploying code to production environments
â€¢ Experience with implementing unit and end-to-end testing
â€¢ Working proficiency and communication skills in spoken and written English

NICE TO HAVES:
â€¢ University degree in a STEM field
â€¢ Experience integrating with CI/CD tools (Github Actions)
â€¢ Experience with server-client technologies (RPC)
â€¢ Experience with game engines such as Unreal or Unity
â€¢ Experience with modern Web development
â€¢ Experience with graphics programming (OpenGL, Vulkan, OptiX)

If you are located outside of Japan we will set up an interview over Google Hangout Meet.

WHAT WE OFFER

ãƒ»Competitive Salary - Based on experience

ãƒ»Work Hours - Flexible working time with NO core-hours

ãƒ»Paid Holiday - 20 days per year (prorated)

ãƒ»Sick Leave - 6 days per year (prorated)

ãƒ»Holiday - Sat & Sun, Japanese National Holidays, and other days defined by our company

ãƒ»Japanese Social Security - all applicable (Health Insurance, Pension, Workersâ€™ Comp, and Unemployment Insurance, Long-term care insurance)

ãƒ»In-house Training Program (software study/language study)

By submitting your application you agree to the following terms: https://woven.toyota/en/applicant-privacy-notice

Our Commitment

ãƒ»We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity.

ãƒ»We pledge that any information we receive from you will be used ONLY for the purpose of hiring assessment

description:
As a part of the Robotics System Team, you will be focusing on algorithmic design, development, and deployment of robotics technologies.

We work in a fast-paced, agile environment where we constantly collaborate, review ideas amongst peers, and test proposed solutions. We encourage continuous learning and brainstorming of ideas within the team!

â€¢ Solve cutting-edge scientific and technical challenges in motion planning, control, and system design of industrial robots.
â€¢ Design, develop, and test 1) motion planning and control algorithms for industrial robots to execute various tasks such as picking and material handling; 2) highly concurrent software systems; 3) real-time communication modules with robot controllers and peripheral devices in C/C++.
â€¢ Deploy Mujin systems at customer sites.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Job Description

Our Tokyo engineering team is hiring a backend software engineer to work on one of the company's key components, included in all of our product offerings. The team's mission is to provide a solid, tested and performant database / API / messaging bus layer that is shared across our deployments. While the engineer's role is focused on software development and good software engineering practice, our values encourage open discussion and being a good colleague.

The position is available on site in Tokyo, Japan.

Our official language is English.

In this role, you will
â€¢ Develop Rapyuta's core components
â€¢ Improve code quality at the same time
â€¢ Collaborate with developers from other teams

Restrictions
â€¢ No telecommuting
â€¢ No Agencies Please

Requirements

3~5 years Python experience, including 3.10~3.11
â€¢ Web frameworks (e.g. FastAPI or Django)
â€¢ Databases (NoSQL or RDBMS, e.g. Redis or Postgres)
â€¢ Test & build (pytest, GitHub Actions, Docker)

Bonus points
â€¢ Presented... at a conference, even if something small
â€¢ Can articulate technology choices, e.g. Tornado vs. Flask
â€¢ Practical experience with asyncio or some messaging bus
â€¢ Open-source contributions

Is this the right job for you?
â€¢ You like APIs designed with a clear purpose
â€¢ You want to see your code in production
â€¢ You like to know how your component operates as part of a larger system

About the Company

Our Core Purpose:Empowering Lives With Connected Machines

Based on our core value of empathy we strongly believe that the dirty, dull, and dangerous work should be automated and people should be given an option to take up more intellectually challenging and creative work. We want to enable this automation with machines that are connected and coordinated in a streamlined manner

Job Description

Our Tokyo engineering team is hiring a backend software engineer to work on one of the company's key components, included in all of our product offerings. The team's mission is to provide a solid, tested and performant database / API / messaging bus layer that is shared across our deployments. While the engineer's role is focused on software development and good software engineering practice, our values encourage open discussion and being a good colleague.

The position is available on site in Tokyo, Japan.

Our official language is English.

In this role, you will
â€¢ Develop Rapyuta's core components
â€¢ Improve code quality at the same time
â€¢ Collaborate with developers from other teams

Restrictions
â€¢ No telecommuting
â€¢ No Agencies Please

Requirements

3~5 years Python experience, including 3.10~3.11
â€¢ Web frameworks (e.g. FastAPI or Django)
â€¢ Databases (NoSQL or RDBMS, e.g. Redis or Postgres)
â€¢ Test & build (pytest, GitHub Actions, Docker)

Bonus points
â€¢ Presented... at a conference, even if something small
â€¢ Can articulate technology choices, e.g. Tornado vs. Flask
â€¢ Practical experience with asyncio or some messaging bus
â€¢ Open-source contributions

Is this the right job for you?
â€¢ You like APIs designed with a clear purpose
â€¢ You want to see your code in production
â€¢ You like to know how your component operates as part of a larger system

About the Company

Our Core Purpose:Empowering Lives With Connected Machines

Based on our core value of empathy we strongly believe that the dirty, dull, and dangerous work should be automated and people should be given an option to take up more intellectually challenging and creative work. We want to enable this automation with machines that are connected and coordinated in a streamlined manner

title: Software Engineer
description:
Your Mission

The Global Analytics & Data Products Team is looking for a software engineer to join our team. Your mission is to create and extend our cloud-based data platform infrastructure.

Priorities can change in a fast-paced environment like ours, so this role includes, but is not limited to the following responsibilities:
â€¢ Design and implement secure, scalable, high-performance, and robust data services for connected vehicle data in distributed data processing platforms using REST, gRPC, and GraphQL
â€¢ Design, extend, and review data architecture, model, flow, and integration â€“ be hands-on and involved with every stage of the software development life cycle
â€¢ Partner with data engineers and data scientists to meet the need of upstream and downstream dependencies
â€¢ Develop state-of-the-art functional code â€“ influence/establish the software development culture of the team
â€¢ Establish standards and best practices for instrumentation within software engineering

Top Performers will... be able to demonstrate:
â€¢ Taking abstract concepts ideas and implementing them in a robust manner
EOE/Disability/Veteran

Basic Qualifications:
â€¢ BA/BSc in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related technical discipline preferred
â€¢ 2 or more years of experience in the software engineering and software development life cycle
â€¢ Experience with more than one coding language
â€¢ Experience with one or more functional languages such as F#, Scala, or Haskell
â€¢ Familiarity with streaming technologies like Kafka
â€¢ Experience with continuous integration tools like Jenkinsor GitHub Actions
â€¢ Experience with creating containerized applications using Docker and running them on Kubernetes
â€¢ Experience writing SQL queries
â€¢ Experience in AWS using IAM, EKS, EC2, S3

Preferred Qualifications:
â€¢ Experience using functional Scala libraries such as Cats or ZIO
â€¢ Experience working with cloud Big Data platforms (, Spark, Google BigQuery, Azure Data Warehouse, etc.)
â€¢ Experience with workflow management engines (, Airflow, Luigi, Azure Data Factory, etc.)
At Stellantis, we assess candidates based on qualifications, merit and business needs. We welcome applications from people of all gender identities, age, ethnicity, nationality, religion, sexual orientation and disability. Diverse teams will allow us to better meet the evolving needs of our customers and care for our future

1. Technical Support

[Attractive Points]
ETAS embedded software solutions called RTA has long history more than 20 years in automotive area especially for real time operating system (RTOS).
ETAS RTA solutions cover wide range of software development life cycle (famous V model) from functional delopment, embedded source code, virtual verification and measurement and calibration, which are bringing much bebefit for customers such as automotive suppliers and OEMs.
In addition to product charm, ETAS Japan has much responsibility and authority which allows to exploit person's ability.
ETAS head office is flexible to listen to and discuss voice from Japan.

Technical support for embedded software (Mainly AUTOSAR)ã€€(Japan Market)
1. Technical Support
â€¢ Design, write and test software from imprecise specifications
â€¢ Basic knowledge of functional safety and ability to discuss safety requirements with customers
â€¢ Analyze the required specifications of the project, formulate a project plan, and manage the process
â€¢ Lead first level support to troubleshoot issues reported by customers
Initiate and track 2nd or 3rd level support while keeping customers updated
2. Product development support
â€¢ Supporting product development teams in the understanding of customer requirements, preparing sample projects and facilitating customer communication
3.Pre-sales support
â€¢ Support product managers and the sales team to provide clarification and support on technical queries on products including the development of demonstrators, leading workshop at customers

[Attractive Points]
ETAS embedded software solutions called RTA has long history more than 20 years in automotive area especially for real time operating system (RTOS).
ETAS RTA solutions cover wide range of software development life cycle (famous V model) from functional delopment, embedded source code, virtual verification and measurement and calibration, which are bringing much bebefit for customers such as automotive suppliers and OEMs.
In addition to product charm, ETAS Japan has much responsibility and authority which allows to exploit person's ability.
ETAS head office is flexible to listen to and discuss voice from Japan.

title: Software Engineer, Backend [Merpay]
description:
Working at Merpay

Merpay is home to some of the greatest experts within Mercari Group. Our commitment to a culture of openness allows members to discuss architecture on Slack channels organized by business domain, send pull requests to each other on GitHub, and share knowledge on the internal Wiki. We hold â€œGo Fridayâ€ and other weekly study groups for engineers but open to all, encouraging engineers to help one another grow. Some members have no experience developing in Go before they join, but we help turn them into Go enthusiasts early on through involvement in our internal Go community and â€œGopher Dojo,â€ our short-term, intensive training. Members further develop their expertise while demonstrating their abilities at both internal and external engineering community events.

Job Description
â€¢ Handle web application and API development in Go
â€¢ API/interface design for microservices using Protocol Buffers and gRPC
â€¢ Improving services and measuring effectiveness using quantitative... and qualitative analysis on user behavior logs, etc.
â€¢ Design architecture and select middleware based on application requirements
â€¢ Microservice performance tuning, monitoring, and alert handling

Development Environment
â€¢ Programming languages: Go
â€¢ Infrastructure: Google Cloud Platform (Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine, Spanner, Cloud SQL, Storage, Stackdriver Logging, Dataflow, Pub/Sub, etc.)
â€¢ Configuration management tools: Terraform
â€¢ Analysis Platform: BigQuery / Looker / Data Studio
â€¢ Monitoring: Stackdriver Monitoring / Datadog / PagerDuty / Sentry
â€¢ CI/CD: Circle CI / Spinnaker
â€¢ Knowledge Tool: Crowi / Confluence
â€¢ Other: GitHub / Slack
â€¢ Development Method: Agile (Scrum, Kanban, etc.)

Required Experience
â€¢ Shared belief in Merpayâ€™s mission and values
â€¢ Knowledge and experience in web application development
â€¢ Experience designing schemas and creating efficient queries for databases (such as RDB, NoSQL, etc.)
â€¢ Experience operating web applications and conducting performance tuning, knowledge in security
â€¢ Experience selecting middleware and designing software architecture
â€¢ Ability to take ownership and lead the software development process

Preferred Experience
â€¢ Experience developing and operating using Go and GCP
â€¢ Experience developing and operating large-scale, high traffic system
â€¢ Experience establishing new services and tackling the challenges in the growth phase of a service
â€¢ Experience as developer lead or management / experience improving the development process
â€¢ Experience in statistical data analysis
