title: ã€Typetalkã€‘Software Engineer / In-house Development / Remote Work...
description:
-------------------------------------------
Job Description
-------------------------------------------

The company is looking for an engineer to lead the design and implementation of Typetalk from the front-end to the back-end. This is a staff enhancement to focus more on backend design and implementation in anticipation of future user growth. The project is often conducted through agile scrum development, and aims for a highly productive work style.

At Typetalk, the team considers the value to be delivered to users through internal and external user interviews, while using the product developed by Typetalk as the primary user every day. Each member brings their own strengths to the team and collaborates with each other to develop new functions and improve the environment on a daily basis.

â– What is "Typetalk"?
A business chat tool that increases the amount of internal chatter, brings a sense of unity to the team, and generates ideas through collaboration among members.
With the... expansion of teleworking in recent years, the number of active users of Typetalk and the utilization rate of its features are also increasing.
Typetalk is also a good companion to Backlog, and by using Backlog as a tool for storing information and Typetalk as a tool for information flow, collaboration in an organization can be further accelerated.

â– Development Environment
Scala / Play Framework / TypeScript / Angular / PostgreSQL / Git / AWS / Docker / Electron

-------------------------------------------
Required Skills
-------------------------------------------

â– Required
At least 3 years of working experience in Java or Scala
Knowledgeable in front-end and back-end development.
Able to develop smoothly using Git.
Able to handle basic Linux commands.
Basic knowledge of RDB.
Comfortable communicating in English (mainly reading and writing).

â– Preferred
Experience in development using Scala (or Java) and JavaScript
Experience designing GUI/SPA applications (MVC, MVVM, etc.)
Experience leading projects (any size)
Experience in Agile/Scrum development
Experience working in open source communities
Experience presenting at seminars and technical conferences
Experience releasing private applications or services

â– Ideal Applicants
Empathy with the vision of what we want to achieve with our products
Able to plan projects on their own and work collaboratively with others
Enjoy the process of identifying issues and problems and solving them with team members
Able to transform abstract ideas and projects into concrete actions and drive them forward.
Enjoy and learn about ever-changing technology trends

-------------------------------------------
Location
-------------------------------------------

Fukuoka

-------------------------------------------
Contract Type
-------------------------------------------

Fulltime

-------------------------------------------
Annual Salary
-------------------------------------------

600 Million yen ~ 900 Million yen

title: Principal Software Engineer
description:
As a principal engineer, you will work on the latest cutting edge technologies such as F#, .NET Core, React, React Native and TypeScript. You will also be contributing to our rapidly expanding business by improving our highly scalable and efficient software systems.

Qualifications and Responsibilities:
â€¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
â€¢ Excellent communication skills in verbal and written English
â€¢ 10+ years experience with the one or more of the following: web application development, architecting and developing large scale design, distributed and parallel systems
â€¢ Capability of mentoring engineers is preferred
â€¢ Thrives in a functional programming environment
â€¢ Work with other engineers and product team in planning, prioritising and executing assigned projects with pushing deadlines
â€¢ Take part in recommendation for new software technologies and company roadmaps
â€¢ Take part in code reviews

Benefits:
â€¢ Industry-leading salary
â€¢ Fun work... environment
â€¢ Always have new challenges to work on
â€¢ Gain experience with scalable innovative software systems

title: Software Engineer - App Stores Backend (Remote)
description:
Summary

This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about open source software, Linux, and Web Services at scale. Come build a rewarding, meaningful career working with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical, a growing international software company.

Canonical's Store team develops and operates the backend services that power the Snap Store and Charmhub.io marketplaces. Our services are built primarily in Python, within a bit of Golang. If you have a passion for clean APIs, have a bias towards shipping and believe that tests are the key to higher velocity and reliability, you'll fit right in.

We have some exciting challenges ahead including continuing to scale our production architecture, expand the store backend to handle additional package types, and enhance our on-prem offering for IoT and Enterprise solutions.

What You'll Do
â€¢ Collaborate remotely with a globally distributed team.
â€¢ Write clean web service APIs to support... both CLI and web frontend clients, using Python (and optionally Golang).
â€¢ Design and implement new features and enhancements from spec to production and ongoing operations at scale.
â€¢ Review code and technical designs produced by other engineers.
â€¢ Discuss ideas and collaborate on finding good solutions.
â€¢ Work remotely with global travel 2 to 4 weeks for internal and external events.

Who You Are
â€¢ You love technology and working with a diverse set of talented people.
â€¢ You are curious, flexible, articulate, and accountable.
â€¢ You value soft skills and are passionate, enterprising, thoughtful, and self-motivated.
â€¢ You have a broad technology base but favor backend code and infrastructure.
â€¢ You have proficiency developing public-facing APIs and web applications, preferably using Python and/or Golang.
â€¢ You know your way around relational and non-relational databases and can effectively design data models that perform well, and tune queries to access them.
â€¢ You are comfortable with Ubuntu as a development and deployment platform.
â€¢ You have a Bachelor's or equivalent in Computer Science, STEM or similar degree.

About Canonical

Canonical is a growing, international software company that works with the open-source community to deliver Ubuntu -- the world's #1 cloud operating system. Our mission is to realise the potential of free software in the lives of individuals and organisations. Our services are helping businesses worldwide to reduce costs, improve efficiency and enhance security with Ubuntu. Canonical is a unique tech company - global, remote-first, open source, with 700 professionals across 50 countries - we want to be the world's best, not biggest, global software company. With almost every team remote by default, Canonical sets the pace on the 21st-century digital workplace.

What Canonical offers:
â€¢ Work from home
â€¢ Learning and development allowances
â€¢ Competitive Salary
â€¢ Annual compensation review
â€¢ Recognition rewards
â€¢ Generous annual leave
â€¢ Paid maternity, paternity and sick leave
â€¢ Priority Pass for travel
â€¢ Exposure to international business and technology

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: AR/Voice, Software Engineer, Inventor Tools
description:
Woven by Toyota is the mobility technology subsidiary of Toyota Motor Corporation. Our mission is to deliver safe, intelligent, human-centered mobility for all. Through our Arene mobility software platform, safety-first automated driving technology and Toyota Woven City â€” our test course for advanced mobility â€” weâ€™re bringing greater freedom, safety and happiness to people and society.

Our unique global culture weaves modern Silicon Valley innovation and time-tested Japanese quality craftsmanship. We leverage these complementary strengths to amplify the capabilities of drivers, foster happiness, and elevate well-being.

THE TEAM

The Toyota Woven City is a fully connected ecosystem powered by hydrogen fuel cells to be built at the base of Mt. Fuji in Japan. It is envisioned as a 'living laboratory' and 'ever evolving,' incorporating various types of cutting edge technologies. At the same time, it is also 'human-centric,' that is, it is expected to keep people safe and... comfortable.

Woven City's R&D team will develop innovative products and services using technologies developed by Toyota Motor Corporation.

Our mission is to:
â€¢ Develop services and products for Woven City
â€¢ Expand capabilities through long-term R&D

Toyota Motor Corporation has been involved in a variety of technological development in the robotics, energy, and automotive domains for a long time. Our team will leverage Toyota's hardware expertise in these fields to create new value by developing software on top of this.

Our team will develop innovative services that are essential to the city. As a first party developer, we will also build a foundation upon which third party partners can participate. Therefore, we are responsible for not just the applications but also the core software and capabilities.

Our team consists of many highly experienced members with international work experience. We strive to be open minded as we create a new culture with members from various backgrounds and nationalities. Our global team works closely with the Toyota Motor Corporation and the Toyota Research Institute in North America to develop our technologies and products.

We are seeking talented people to join us as we take on new challenges to create new products and services for the Toyota Woven City.

WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

At Woven City, we want to provide an environment where inventors can create as many inventions as possible to make a better and colorful world. We know that a good invention is not just an idea, but is created with a lot of proof and improvement. One of the best sources of improvement is "insight" from potential users and customers. We are looking for engineers who are excited to develop and integrate AR/Voice application that extracts "insight" from the cutting-edge user experience in Woven City.

The inventor tools provide a variety of functions for inventors to start and improve their inventions in Woven City. This will require a strong partnership with other developer teams, working across all products and features.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
â€¢ Own almost all of the processes of developing AR/Voice functions and software for Inventor Service Development
â€¢ Exercise technical judgments in working with cross-functional teams
â€¢ Build, expand and manage the software development team
â€¢ Directing and managing each step of the system development process and release deliverables
â€¢ Coordinate with partner companies on system design, installation, operation, and maintenance

MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:
â€¢ Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science or related field
â€¢ 3+ year of professional experience AR/VR software development
â€¢ Comprehensive experience and knowledge for AR/VR development and related game engine (Preference: C#/Unity)
â€¢ Comprehensive experience and knowledge for voice recognition and text-to-speech
â€¢ Comprehensive experience and knowledge for testing design and frameworks
â€¢ Experience and knowledge in using various development and testing tools for efficient team Dev Ops. (Git, GitHub, CI/CD tools, Jira, AWS or GCP or MS Azure, Docker)
â€¢ Proficiency in Business-level English

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
â€¢ Master's degree or higher in Computer Science or related field
â€¢ Comprehensive experience and knowledge for 3D modeling
â€¢ Comprehensive experience and knowledge for 3D environment reconstruction
â€¢ Proficiency in Business-level Japanese

If you are currently located outside of Japan, don't worry, we'll set an interview over Google Hangout Meet or Skype.

What We Offer

ãƒ»Competitive Salary - Based on experience

ãƒ»Work Hours - Flexible working time with NO core-hours

ãƒ»Paid Holiday - 20 days per year (prorated)

ãƒ»Sick Leave - 6 days per year (prorated)

ãƒ»Holiday - Sat & Sun, Japanese National Holidays, and other days defined by our company

ãƒ»Japanese Social Security - all applicable (Health Insurance, Pension, Workersâ€™ Comp, and Unemployment Insurance, Long-term care insurance)

ãƒ»In-house Training Program (software study/language study)

By submitting your application you agree to the following terms: https://woven.toyota/en/applicant-privacy-notice

Our Commitment

ãƒ»We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity.

ãƒ»We pledge that any information we receive from you will be used ONLY for the purpose of hiring assessment

title: Software Engineer, Frontend - Mercari/ãƒªã‚³ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¹é ˜åŸŸæ–°è¦äº‹æ¥­
description:
JD in Japanese follows. è‹±æ–‡ã®å¾Œã«å’Œæ–‡JDã‚’ã”è¦§ã„ãŸã ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚

Introduction

Circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people

"What can I do to help society thrive with the finite resources we have?" The Mercari marketplace app was born in 2013 out of this thought by our founder Shintaro Yamada as he traveled the world. We believe that by circulating all forms of value, not just physical things and money, we can create opportunities for anyone to realize their dreams and contribute to society and the people around them. Mercari aims to use technology to connect people all over the world and create a world where anyone can unleash their potential.For more information about Mercari Groupâ€™s mission, see Mercari's Culture Doc.

Equal Opportunity Hiring

Here at Mercari, we work to realize a world in which no oneâ€™s potential is limited by their background and everyone has the opportunity to freely create value. We also firmly believe that a mindset of Diversity & Inclusion is essential... for us to achieve our mission.

This, of course, extends to our hiring practices as well. Mercari is committed to eliminating discrimination based on age, gender, sexual orientation, race, religion, physical disability, and other such factors so that anyone who shares our mission and values can join us, regardless of their background. For more details, please read our D&I Statement.

Teamâ€™s Mission / Work Responsibilities
â€¢ Mercari is preparing to launch a new business as its next step to enhance the creation of a circular economy.
â€¢ The team in charge of this new business is working to create a resale service platform that anyone, both individuals and businesses, can easily use. By creating a system to recirculate the 43.7 trillion yen worth of â€œhidden assetsâ€1 in Japan, we hope to further expand Japanâ€™s secondhand market, which is currently estimated to be 3 trillion yen.
â€¢ In concrete terms, our business consists of making the reusing of items the norm by breaking down the borders between online and offline and between primary and secondary distribution. This marks the first time Mercari has taken on such a challenge, and it contains a lot of hidden potential.
â€¢ (Learn more about Mercari's mission and values here.)
â€¢ The value of â€œhidden assetsâ€ is defined as the quantity of unneeded items sitting in households in Japan (as found in a survey) converted to Japanese yen using the average value of transactions on Mercari. â€œUnneeded itemsâ€ is defined as items that have not been used for at least one year, but remain in the household for no particular reason

Specific work responsibilities include the following:
â€¢ Lead the launch of a new platform for the Recommerce area.
â€¢ Select the technologies and create the system architecture and specifications necessary to develop a new platform.
â€¢ Design and implement a web frontend that uses various kinds of frameworks such as TypeScript and React.

Unique and Bold Challenges
â€¢ Our business is directly linked to Mercari Groupâ€™s mission of â€œcirculate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people.â€
â€¢ As this is a new business and team made up of a select few, you will be expected to take on a broad range of responsibilities.
â€¢ In your role, youâ€™ll work on developing a new platform for promoting secondary distribution, and be involved in various decision-making in the 0 > 1 phase of our business. Weâ€™re therefore looking for someone who will go beyond simply using and expanding Mercariâ€™s existing systems.ã€€

Required Qualifications
â€¢ Shared belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
â€¢ Ability to work flexibly and independently in a constantly evolving environment
â€¢ Experience selecting middleware and designing software architecture
â€¢ Ability to take ownership and lead the software development process
â€¢ Knowledge of and experience in web application development
â€¢ Basic knowledge of performance, accessibility, and security
â€¢ Conceptual understanding of version management and development experience using Git
â€¢ Knowledge of TypeScript and development experience working with UI libraries or frameworks such as React, Vue.js, and Angular
â€¢ Skills for understanding and providing basic explanations of web operation principles and browsersã€€

Preferred Qualifications
â€¢ Experience establishing new services and tackling the challenges in the growth phase of a service
â€¢ Experience leading or managing developers and experience improving the development process
â€¢ Extensive knowledge of standard web technologies and specialized knowledge in some areas
â€¢ Understanding of the characteristics of different libraries/frameworks and the ability to advance their introduction to projects where necessary
â€¢ Experience of architecture design based on the characteristics of an application
â€¢ Experience of consistently taking initiative in implementing improvements to an application
â€¢ Basic knowledge of GraphQL

Screening Criteria
â€¢ Shares our belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
â€¢ Has leadership ability, flexibility, and agility
â€¢ Takes ownership of their work and puts forth maximum effort
â€¢ Able to find joy in the unknown and focus on the â€œcansâ€ rather than the â€œcannotsâ€
â€¢ Has a passion for creating new business
â€¢ Able to share the sentiment of Mercari Group that â€œeveryone is a software engineerâ€

ã€€(See this page for details.)

Key Points for Technical Assignments
â€¢ Rather than testing the depth of your knowledge of unique technologies or frameworks, the system design interview will check your overall ability to define the issue in front of you and see how, through your thought process, you come to a solution while communicating with your team members.
â€¢ Specifically, we will check the following points:
â€¢ How effectively do you communicate with the interviewer?
â€¢ If there are any system requirements that you do not know, are you able to ask questions and reach an accurate understanding?
â€¢ How do you work to resolve a problem that has no single correct answer?
â€¢ How do you make considerations for scalability and availability?
â€¢ If solving a problem results in a tradeoff, how do you approach decision-making?
â€¢ What sort of thought process do you go through to improve on ideas?
â€¢ Do you have a grasp of what system problems and improvements there are?

Introduction

Circulate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people

"What can I do to help society thrive with the finite resources we have?" The Mercari marketplace app was born in 2013 out of this thought by our founder Shintaro Yamada as he traveled the world. We believe that by circulating all forms of value, not just physical things and money, we can create opportunities for anyone to realize their dreams and contribute to society and the people around them. Mercari aims to use technology to connect people all over the world and create a world where anyone can unleash their potential.For more information about Mercari Groupâ€™s mission, see Mercari's Culture Doc.

Equal Opportunity Hiring

Here at Mercari, we work to realize a world in which no oneâ€™s potential is limited by their background and everyone has the opportunity to freely create value. We also firmly believe that a mindset of Diversity & Inclusion is essential... for us to achieve our mission.

This, of course, extends to our hiring practices as well. Mercari is committed to eliminating discrimination based on age, gender, sexual orientation, race, religion, physical disability, and other such factors so that anyone who shares our mission and values can join us, regardless of their background. For more details, please read our D&I Statement.

Teamâ€™s Mission / Work Responsibilities
â€¢ Mercari is preparing to launch a new business as its next step to enhance the creation of a circular economy.
â€¢ The team in charge of this new business is working to create a resale service platform that anyone, both individuals and businesses, can easily use. By creating a system to recirculate the 43.7 trillion yen worth of â€œhidden assetsâ€1 in Japan, we hope to further expand Japanâ€™s secondhand market, which is currently estimated to be 3 trillion yen.
â€¢ In concrete terms, our business consists of making the reusing of items the norm by breaking down the borders between online and offline and between primary and secondary distribution. This marks the first time Mercari has taken on such a challenge, and it contains a lot of hidden potential.
â€¢ (Learn more about Mercari's mission and values here.)
â€¢ The value of â€œhidden assetsâ€ is defined as the quantity of unneeded items sitting in households in Japan (as found in a survey) converted to Japanese yen using the average value of transactions on Mercari. â€œUnneeded itemsâ€ is defined as items that have not been used for at least one year, but remain in the household for no particular reason

Specific work responsibilities include the following:
â€¢ Lead the launch of a new platform for the Recommerce area.
â€¢ Select the technologies and create the system architecture and specifications necessary to develop a new platform.
â€¢ Design and implement a web frontend that uses various kinds of frameworks such as TypeScript and React.

Unique and Bold Challenges
â€¢ Our business is directly linked to Mercari Groupâ€™s mission of â€œcirculate all forms of value to unleash the potential in all people.â€
â€¢ As this is a new business and team made up of a select few, you will be expected to take on a broad range of responsibilities.
â€¢ In your role, youâ€™ll work on developing a new platform for promoting secondary distribution, and be involved in various decision-making in the 0 > 1 phase of our business. Weâ€™re therefore looking for someone who will go beyond simply using and expanding Mercariâ€™s existing systems.ã€€

Required Qualifications
â€¢ Shared belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
â€¢ Ability to work flexibly and independently in a constantly evolving environment
â€¢ Experience selecting middleware and designing software architecture
â€¢ Ability to take ownership and lead the software development process
â€¢ Knowledge of and experience in web application development
â€¢ Basic knowledge of performance, accessibility, and security
â€¢ Conceptual understanding of version management and development experience using Git
â€¢ Knowledge of TypeScript and development experience working with UI libraries or frameworks such as React, Vue.js, and Angular
â€¢ Skills for understanding and providing basic explanations of web operation principles and browsersã€€

Preferred Qualifications
â€¢ Experience establishing new services and tackling the challenges in the growth phase of a service
â€¢ Experience leading or managing developers and experience improving the development process
â€¢ Extensive knowledge of standard web technologies and specialized knowledge in some areas
â€¢ Understanding of the characteristics of different libraries/frameworks and the ability to advance their introduction to projects where necessary
â€¢ Experience of architecture design based on the characteristics of an application
â€¢ Experience of consistently taking initiative in implementing improvements to an application
â€¢ Basic knowledge of GraphQL

Screening Criteria
â€¢ Shares our belief in the mission and values of Mercari Group and its various companies
â€¢ Has leadership ability, flexibility, and agility
â€¢ Takes ownership of their work and puts forth maximum effort
â€¢ Able to find joy in the unknown and focus on the â€œcansâ€ rather than the â€œcannotsâ€
â€¢ Has a passion for creating new business
â€¢ Able to share the sentiment of Mercari Group that â€œeveryone is a software engineerâ€

ã€€(See this page for details.)

Key Points for Technical Assignments
â€¢ Rather than testing the depth of your knowledge of unique technologies or frameworks, the system design interview will check your overall ability to define the issue in front of you and see how, through your thought process, you come to a solution while communicating with your team members.
â€¢ Specifically, we will check the following points:
â€¢ How effectively do you communicate with the interviewer?
â€¢ If there are any system requirements that you do not know, are you able to ask questions and reach an accurate understanding?
â€¢ How do you work to resolve a problem that has no single correct answer?
â€¢ How do you make considerations for scalability and availability?
â€¢ If solving a problem results in a tradeoff, how do you approach decision-making?
â€¢ What sort of thought process do you go through to improve on ideas?
â€¢ Do you have a grasp of what system problems and improvements there are?

title: Software Engineer Java F/M
description:
Our client is a Hong Kong Fintech company providing a technology platform bringing together a community of financial institutions and licensed operators.

Responsibilities

â€¢ Work with our internal business teams to analyse & produce new functional modules, or

enhance/maintain existing modules to ensure business requirements are met.

â€¢ Involve in software deployment.

â€¢ Ensuring the performance, efficiency, quality and responsiveness of developed applications met

certain expectations by the IT unit.

â€¢ To plan, facilitate and execute UAT testing sessions, working alongside with external teams (if

necessary) for full resolution of UAT issues.

â€¢ Practice and follow proper software design & development methods, including DevOps.

â€¢ Prepare and maintain technical related documentation such as Technical Specification, Technical

Manual & etc.

Requirements

â€¢ B.S degree in Computer Science or relevant field of study.

â€¢ At least 3 years of Java software related working experience.

â€¢... Comfortable in using Java technology for web-based applications, preferably in Apache Maven,

Spring and Hibernate, HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

â€¢ Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.

â€¢ Good understanding of Internet technology, and n-tier architecture.

â€¢ Open-minded to new solutions, forward-thinking and strong ability to adapt.

â€¢ Good database and SQL skills, especially Postgres

Proficient in English and Japanese

This is a full-remote position

title: Python Web Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Web Developer with a strong understanding of AWS services. This individual will work as a critical member of our engineering team. This role requires a high level of proficiency in Python programming and extensive knowledge of AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a keen understanding of the latest web development methodologies and a familiarity with Django Web Framework.
Responsibilities
â€¢ Develop and maintain robust and secure web applications using Python.
â€¢ Leverage your expertise in AWS services for the development, deployment, and scaling of our web applications.
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features and modules.
â€¢ Write well-designed, testable, and efficient code following best software development practices.
â€¢ Provide technical leadership, mentoring, and bring a passion for technology to motivate and inspire.
Requirements
â€¢ Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information... Systems, or equivalent relevant experience.
â€¢ Proven experience as a Web Developer using Python. Knowledge of frameworks like Django or Flask is essential.
â€¢ Strong experience with AWS services including but not limited to EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, and SQS.
â€¢ Experience in deploying applications using containers (Docker, Kubernetes).
â€¢ Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices, especially in areas of scalability and security.
â€¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Nice to haves

While not required, tell us if you have any of the following.
â€¢ Familiarity with front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React

title: J2ee web developer(PRODUCTION SUPPORT)
description:
â– About Cognizant

Cognizant (NASDAQ-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant is ranked 230 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.

â– About the roleï¼š

To develop and provide high quality operational and technical application and systems support to customers and internal business functions. Minimizing the adverse impact of Incidents and Problems on the business and preventing reoccurrence of Incidents.

â– the J2EE WEB DEVELOPER (PRODUCTION SUPPORT ) will:

ï¼œApplication Supportï¼

ãƒ»Working knowledge of JAVA/J2EE web based applications

ãƒ»Interact with internal teams and external 3rd party vendors to trouble shoot and resolve complex problems

ãƒ»Design... appropriate metrics for reporting on key performance and quality indicators, particularly in terms of in-depth trend analysis

ãƒ»Maintain application monitoring, performance tuning and testing

ãƒ»Provide timely and export advice on emerging trends and issues affecting Service Delivery and Support. Develop strategies to allow Application Support to manage resultant problems

ï¼œPersonal and Team Developmentï¼

ãƒ»Share / spread knowledge with team members as well as internal teams

ãƒ»Pro-active in maintaining and increasing the teams and your own technical knowledge

ãƒ»Identify training needs or requirements for yourself individually and for the team

ãƒ»Coach and develop team members

ãƒ»Delivering project within agreed timeframes

ï¼œDocumentationï¼

ãƒ»Ensure incidents and problems are up-to-date

ãƒ»Ensure all technical and non-technical documentation is up-to-date

ãƒ»Contribute to management reports

ï¼œCritical Success Factorsï¼

ãƒ»Achieving high levels of user satisfaction

Demonstration of ownership of problems

Measured contribution towards the reduction of aged problems

Measured contribution towards maintaining a level of expectations with customers internally/externally for services provided

Incidents and problems are resolved within SLA

â– Experience - Essentialï¼ˆå…¨14é …ç›®ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚9é …ç›®ç›®ä»¥é™ã¯å¿œå‹Ÿè³‡æ ¼æ¬„ã«è¨˜è¼‰ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼‰

1. Hands-on Java/J2EE programming and diagnostic experience

2. Configuration and support of enterprise software applications

3. Knowledge of Oracle and/or SQL server, including the ability to write complex SQL queries

4. Knowledge of application servers such as Tomcat, Jboss, and WebSphere

5. Experience of designing, coding, testing and installing application programs across multiple platforms.

6. Strong documentation skills, troubleshooting experience and strong analysis skills.

7. Excellent communication skills

8. Hands on experience in designing and developing applications using Java EE platforms

title: Senior Web Developer - Multinational IT Company
description:
About Our Client

Our client is one of the most sizablesizable software development company listed in Japan, who provides exciting career opportunities for professionals seeking to make an impact in the industry. Their company culture focus on employee development, offering a collaborative team environment where you can stay up to date with the latest technologies and advance your career. With a strong emphasis on delivering exceptional value to our customers, everyone has the opportunity to contribute to our mission and make a meaningful impact. They are looking for a Senior Web Developer to join their new business.

Job Description

The candidate will report to Project Manager and to maintain an e-commerce website with the team.
â€¢ Understand business requirements, and deliver features with high quality and speed;
â€¢ Design, develop, test, and operate new user-facing features for large scale e-commerce systems;
â€¢ Build reusable, flexible and performantperformant code and libraries for... future use;
â€¢ To perform system improvement (e.g. refactoringrefactoring, adopting appropriate technologies & system architecture, optimizingoptimizing the JSJS performance with a proper optimizationoptimization);
â€¢ Smooth communicate with user, development team and Project Management team.

The Successful Applicant
â€¢ Relevant experience with software development companies;
â€¢ Strong understanding of HTML, CSSCSS, JavaScript and Node.js
â€¢ jsFluent in English is a must, fluent in Japanese would be a good plus;
â€¢ Good understanding of the whole SDLC;SDLC
â€¢ Able to work independently and to provide product training for supporting team.

What's on Offer
â€¢ Flexible working hours
â€¢ Full meal allowance
â€¢ Try out new products and software from the group
â€¢ International and friendly working environment
â€¢ Fast track career
â€¢ Welcome non-Japanese speakers (language is not a barrier

title: Python Web Developer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Python Web Developer with a strong understanding of AWS services. This individual will work as a critical member of our engineering team. This role requires a high level of proficiency in Python programming and extensive knowledge of AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate will have a keen understanding of the latest web development methodologies and a familiarity with Django Web Framework.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Develop and maintain robust and secure web applications using Python.
â€¢ Leverage your expertise in AWS services for the development, deployment, and scaling of our web applications.
â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features and modules.
â€¢ Write well-designed, testable, and efficient code following best software development practices.
â€¢ Provide technical leadership, mentoring, and bring a passion for technology to motivate and inspire.

Requirements
â€¢ Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Computer Science, Information... Systems, or equivalent relevant experience.
â€¢ Proven experience as a Web Developer using Python. Knowledge of frameworks like Django or Flask is essential.
â€¢ Strong experience with AWS services including but not limited to EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda, and SQS.
â€¢ Experience in deploying applications using containers (Docker, Kubernetes).
â€¢ Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices, especially in areas of scalability and security.
â€¢ Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Nice to haves

While not required, tell us if you have any of the following.
â€¢ Familiarity with front-end technologies (like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React

title: Web Developer / System Engineer
description:
Company Description

Our client operates web system and applications development for start-up companies, with their telecommuters in Japan, Mongolia, Vietnam, Thai, Pakistan, and UK.

They are now looking for a Web Developer / System Engineer who can be posted anywhere in the world.

Job Description

Building web system through telecommuting;

Responsible for developing high quality web applications (e.g.) Development in -telemedicine system using/applying WebRTC
â€¢ C to C platform
â€¢ Application bot enables Interactive interface

Weekly Skype meeting with the client.

Managing you work through Git-Flow or GitHub-Flow (the source code management services for software development projects.)

For management of your work, online services like AWS (Amazon Web Service), github, trello, and slack could be frequently used.

Building web system through telecommuting;

Responsible for developing high quality web applications (e.g.) Development in -telemedicine system using/applying... WebRTC

Qualifications
â€¢ 3+ years of Experience in web development using either Ruby, PHP, JAVA (Android), or Swift.
â€¢ Ecommerce development experience
â€¢ Fluency in Japanese, writing and reading

Additional Information

Note that only short-listed candidates will be notified. Thank you for your understanding

title: Web Developer
description:
Our firm is seeking a creative Web Developer that can work with our software application team to achieve our businessâ€™ digital goals. The ideal candidate for this position is a hands-on professional with strong knowledge of content management platforms, and an ability to translate our business needs into client-friendly functions that will expand our websiteâ€™s influence in our industry. The Web Developer will be responsible for updating our current online applications, as well as developing and implementing a usability testing process to ensure that new website applications meet our companyâ€™s requirements.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Create applications that address the phases of SDLC (software development life cycle)
â€¢ Develop comprehensive application testing procedures
â€¢ Update existing applications to meet the security and functionality standards as outlined in the companyâ€™s website policies
â€¢ Implement testing tools that monitor the ongoing performance of the company website
â€¢ Assist in... updating application development policies to ensure that all future applications meet the latest technical requirements

title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)
description:
Weâ€™re currently looking for a senior Python engineer to join our fast-paced growing team.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Design, develop, and maintain innovative features based on business needs
â€¢ Design scalable and fault-tolerant architecture in a distributed cloud deployment
â€¢ Ensure high quality deliverables by maintaining CI/CD, writing solid tests, and concise documentation
â€¢ Improve team synergy and mentor junior engineers
â€¢ Communicate with Design, Product Management and Customer Success teams
â€¢ Our tech stack: Python 3, asyncio, NoSQL, AWS, Docker.

Requirements
â€¢ 3 years of experience with Python backend development
â€¢ Strong background building scalable web applications in Python
â€¢ Ability to mentor junior engineers and work collaboratively in a team environment
â€¢ Experience with cloud infrastructure, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure
â€¢ Ability to automate deployments via CI/CD pipelines
â€¢ Understand the importance of clean code and software documentation
â€¢ Business level English (Japanese is... NOT required)
â€¢ Last but not least, fit with open source and hacker culture

â€¢ Knowledge of security concepts and technologies

â€¢ Degree in Computer Science or other related technical field
â€¢ Team leadership experience

title: Front-end Developer - EC First Party Development Department (ECFD)
description:
Job Description

Business Overview

Rakuten is an EC company that owns Japan's largest platform called Rakuten Ichiba. The business model of Rakuten Ichiba is BtoBtoC, and Client Stores, Society and Rakuten Group work together as a unity. We cooperate and enlarge on the Rakuten Ichiba Platform.

Department Overview

On the other hand, we are taking on the challenge of a business model (BtoC) that leads our whole development by directly operating our own e-commerce that specializes in specific categories and understands each industry.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is a development organization responsible for those BtoC business and taking care from upstream to downstream of whole e-commerce business such as purchasing product, Sales through web-site, marketing and analysis.

Rakuten EC Firstparty Department (ECFD) is currently managing the following services

ãƒ»Rakuten Books

ãƒ»Rakuten Kobo

ãƒ»Rakuten Fashion

ãƒ»Rakuten Bic

ãƒ»Netsuper

ãƒ»Rakuten 24

Position

Why We Hire

Our... services are growing fast and we need new members to help us empower those services with a holistic approach.

Front end for users has been converted to a site based on JavaScript development, and we are looking for not only Java engineer as well as JavaScript engineer.

If you are interested in some specific Service, kindly advise it to HR when you apply.

Position Details

ãƒ»Develop front end for each BtoC Service and also develop BFF.

ãƒ»Develop new or existing function, design, test and release.

ãƒ»Develop highly agile team to meet our speedy-changing business needs.

ãƒ»Develop with cooperating with other various internal

team such as Search Team, Recommend Team.

ãƒ»Conduct load tests, performance tuning, and make countermeasures for Sales promotion , in order to build a system that can withstand high traffic

ãƒ»Discover problems, propose solutions, and make improvements to contribute to the BtoC business.

ãƒ»Develop high quality applications (Requirements, Design, Development, Tests, Review, and Release).

ãƒ»Do operations and improvements on the service after release.

In Particular, Your Responsibilities May Include

ãƒ»Launching new BtoC services.

ãƒ»Analyzing/developing features which are required in new/existing BtoC services.

ãƒ»Developing libraries to increase development efficiency in BtoC services.

In this position, you will have a cross-sectional relationship with a variety of BtoC services. As such, you will have an opportunity to gain extensive knowledge and valuable experiences in the BtoC business.

Furthermore, as this is a newly opened position, you will be able to work with teams to help lay their foundations and pave the way. We are waiting for entries of motivated people.

Work Environment

You will work with ECFD members whoâ€¯have service oriented mind and flexible mind for the better. We have more than 200 members.

Mandatory Qualifications
â€¢ More than 3 years of experience of Web application development for consumers.
â€¢ Experience and basic knowledge of Linux/Unix.
â€¢ More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
â€¢ Experience and basic knowledge of the following languages

(React, Redux, Typescript, PHP, Java)
â€¢ Experience in developing applications using WEB-APIs.
â€¢ Basic knowledge of Web system security.

Desired Qualifications
â€¢ Experience in developing applications using React Hooks.
â€¢ Experience in web application development with SPA, SSR
â€¢ Experience of Docker and Kubernetes
â€¢ Basic knowledge of SEO
â€¢ More than 3 years of experience and basic knowledge of RDB.
â€¢ More than 1 year of experience and basic knowledge of Git.
â€¢ Experience with Agile methodology.
â€¢ Experience in designing/introducing of Middleware.
â€¢ Experience in development with frameworks such as Spring.
â€¢ Experience in design/development of BtoC application (especially experience in developing an EC site).

Others Information

Additional information on Location

Tokyo

#frontend #engineer #Linux #HTML #JavaScript #CSS #React #Redux #Typescript #PHP #Java

Languages

English (Overall - 1 - Beginner), Japanese (Overall - 3 - Advanced

title: Senior Web Developer- SK
description:
Job Description

â–  Company Overview

We run the number one CMS (Content Management System) used in Japan and are expanding globally, with a listing on the Nasdaq stock exchange.

â–  Your Role And Responsibilities
â€¢ Learn Rust to break boundaries and lead SaaS platform implementation.
â€¢ Drive full product tech lifecycle, supporting global expansion and integrating with external APIs.
â€¢ Collaborate closely with CTO, Designers, sales teams, and board members.
â€¢ Conduct code reviews, maintain code quality, and mentor fellow engineers.
â€¢ Take features from concept to fully-fledged product.

â–  Experience And Qualifications
â€¢ Enthusiastic and driven to master Rust.
â€¢ Proficient in Ruby on Rails or Django (3+ years of experience).
â€¢ Preferably with a minimum of 5 years of relevant work experience (emphasizing knowledge over time).
â€¢ Skilled in working with SQL databases.
â€¢ Proficient in developing intricate modern web applications.
â€¢ Thorough understanding of the complete web technology stack... including HTTP, cookies, asset loading, caching, REST, etc.
â€¢ Well-versed in security best practices.

ãƒ»Additional Preferred Qualifications
â€¢ Fluent in English for business communication.
â€¢ Japanese language skills not necessary (Open to applicants without Japanese proficiency).
â€¢ Strong knowledge of Rust is highly advantageous.
â€¢ Familiarity with functional or component testing of services.
â€¢ Experience in developing REST and WebSocket API clients.
â€¢ Basic understanding of signing encrypted requests.

â–  Personal Traits
â€¢ Strong team player with excellent communication skills.
â€¢ Action-oriented with a practical mindset.
â€¢ Open to diverse cultures.
â€¢ Humble and eager to learn.
â€¢ Positive attitude and receptive to feedback.
â€¢ Self-motivated and independent.
â€¢ Good problem-solving and decision-making abilities.
â€¢ Effective time management and prioritization.
â€¢ Understanding of product strategies.
â€¢ Experience with global products.

â–  Good Reasons to Join
â€¢ Commutation expenses provided.
â€¢ Two fully remote days per week (Wednesdays and Fridays).
â€¢ Emphasis on horizontal communication.
â€¢ Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, employment insurance, workers' accident insurance, and pension.
â€¢ Flexible working hours with core hours from 10:00 to 15:00.
â€¢ Opportunity to work in an international and multicultural Japanese company.
â€¢ Opportunity to learn Rust and drive innovation in web development.
â€¢ Direct involvement in shaping product vision, strategy, and prioritization.
â€¢ Support for attending work-related training courses (expenses covered by the company at the discretion of the department head).
â€¢ Daily provision of complimentary coffee, tea, spring water, hot chocolate, and Japanese soups at the company.

â–  Working Style

The standard working hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, including a 1-hour lunch break. However, flexible working hours are also available, with a core time of 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM and a one-hour lunch break.

ãƒ»Remote Work

There are 3 days of in-office work per week, while Wednesdays and Fridays are designated as full remote work days.

ãƒ»Holidays
â€¢ Saturdays, Sundays, company holidays, and national holidays are observed.
â€¢ Employees are entitled to ten paid holidays per year, which become available after the first 6 months of employment. These holidays can be carried over to the following year, allowing for a maximum of 20 total days.
â€¢ Additionally, an extra paid holiday is granted every year, up to a maximum of 20 days, as a part of the company's benefits.

Five additional paid holidays are available upon joining the company.
â€¢ Other annual holidays include the New Year's period (e.g., December 30th to January 3rd), marriage leave, condolence leave, natural disaster leave, maternity leave, and sabbatical (after 3 consecutive years with the

company).

â–  Interview Process

0 - Application screening

1 - First interview (HR and Department head)

2 - Second interview [Tech Skill] (HR and Department head)

3 - Offer (HR or department head

title: Full Stack Engineer
description:
Cogent Labs is looking for a Full Stack developer with 4+ years of relevant experience to enhance our AI products and platforms using ReactJS, NodeJs, and other technologies. Successful candidates will join a highly skilled team, and should be able to design, build, test, and deploy high-quality frontend and backend features.

Responsibilities
â€¢ Work in a team with proper engineering practices through design, code review, and pair programming
â€¢ Implement new API and UI features/architectures in cooperation with other team members, including those in our machine learning team
â€¢ Write clean, scalable, readable, and testable code, and deploy to production often
â€¢ Communicate effectively inside and outside the team

Required skills
â€¢ At least 4 years of relevant experience contributing to a production system
â€¢ Strong coding fundamentals in Javascript/Typescript
â€¢ Excellent skills in the ReactJS ecosystem, HTML, and CSS for front-end development
â€¢ Experience with NodeJS for back-end... development, preferably using a modern web framework (e.g. Loopback)
â€¢ Experience with unit and integration test frameworks and automation (e.g. Jest, Cypress)
â€¢ Knowledge of basic database concepts

Preferred skills
â€¢ Experience refactoring and improving existing codebases
â€¢ Amazon Web Services (AWS)
â€¢ Docker, kubernetes, helm, and related technologies
â€¢ Security experience (e.g. authentication, authorization, Role-Based Access Control)
â€¢ Japanese language ability

Team culture

The Cogent Labs engineering department is continuously working towards developing a culture improving and rewarding the following qualities:
â€¢ Team effort: A cohesive team can be more effective than an isolated prodigy. Engineers are expected to work well in groups and look for opportunities to empower their colleagues.
â€¢ Ownership: Take full responsibility for your own projects and tasks and if needed, cross over boundaries in order to successfully deliver your project.
â€¢ Self-improvement: Create an environment where engineers can focus on their engineering tasks and self-improvement without excessive outside disturbances.
â€¢ Experimentation: Engineers should have some freedom in experimenting with new ideas and technologies, as this ultimately could translate into building better products or the creation of valuable new IP.
â€¢ Quality & Excellence: Maintaining a mindset of developing high quality features and code. We avoid cutting corners as much as possible.
â€¢ Customer Service: Being customer focused, not only externally but internally as well. This means developing services that not only improve the experience of our end customers, but also being â€˜customer serviceâ€™ oriented within your team and the company as a whole by helping out others and sharing knowledge.

The ideal candidate:
â€¢ can empathize Cogent Labsâ€™ VISION and MISSION
â€¢ is a team player who aims for higher goals
â€¢ has integrity and humility, and shows respect and gratitude to others
â€¢ prefers open and transparent communication
â€¢ has a strong growth mindset
â€¢ can receive feedback positively and provide constructive feedback to others

â€¢ At least 4 years of relevant experience contributing to a production system
â€¢ Strong coding fundamentals in Javascript/Typescript
â€¢ Excellent skills in the ReactJS ecosystem, HTML, and CSS for front-end development
â€¢ Experience with NodeJS for back-end... development, preferably using a modern web framework (e.g. Loopback)
â€¢ Experience with unit and integration test frameworks and automation (e.g. Jest, Cypress)
â€¢ Knowledge of basic database concepts

Preferred skills
â€¢ Experience refactoring and improving existing codebases
â€¢ Amazon Web Services (AWS)
â€¢ Docker, kubernetes, helm, and related technologies
â€¢ Security experience (e.g. authentication, authorization, Role-Based Access Control)
â€¢ Japanese language ability

Team culture

The Cogent Labs engineering department is continuously working towards developing a culture improving and rewarding the following qualities:
â€¢ Team effort: A cohesive team can be more effective than an isolated prodigy. Engineers are expected to work well in groups and look for opportunities to empower their colleagues.
â€¢ Ownership: Take full responsibility for your own projects and tasks and if needed, cross over boundaries in order to successfully deliver your project.
â€¢ Self-improvement: Create an environment where engineers can focus on their engineering tasks and self-improvement without excessive outside disturbances.
â€¢ Experimentation: Engineers should have some freedom in experimenting with new ideas and technologies, as this ultimately could translate into building better products or the creation of valuable new IP.
â€¢ Quality & Excellence: Maintaining a mindset of developing high quality features and code. We avoid cutting corners as much as possible.
â€¢ Customer Service: Being customer focused, not only externally but internally as well. This means developing services that not only improve the experience of our end customers, but also being â€˜customer serviceâ€™ oriented within your team and the company as a whole by helping out others and sharing knowledge.

The ideal candidate:
â€¢ can empathize Cogent Labsâ€™ VISION and MISSION
â€¢ is a team player who aims for higher goals
â€¢ has integrity and humility, and shows respect and gratitude to others
â€¢ prefers open and transparent communication
â€¢ has a strong growth mindset
â€¢ can receive feedback positively and provide constructive feedback to others

description: Job Description: Business Overview Rakuten is one of theleading e-commerce companies in the world. Our mission is to empower people andsociety through the internet while aiming at becoming the Global Innovation Company. Rakuten group has morethan 70 businesses worldwide spanning e-commerce, digital content, communications and fin-tech, bringing together more than 1.2 billion members across the world. We have a diversified workforce made up of talented employees from more than 70 countries and regions. Department Overview For this position we are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. If you are an engineer who is passionate to build SMART: Scalable, Maintainable, Automated, Reliable, Technology cutting-edge systems we are the right choice for you! Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with UI/UX... designers and other engineers to bridge the gap between graphical design, user requirements and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works. Position: Why We Hire We are looking for passionate and innovative engineer who can bring fresh ideas, lead the development & operation with getting the peers involved proactively, to join us together in delivering best shopping experiences with high speed and time-to-market. Position Details Understand business requirements, and deliver features with high quality and speed Design, develop, test, and operate new user-facing features for large scale e-commerce systems Build reusable, flexible and perform code and libraries for future use To perform system improvement (e.g. refactoring, adopting appropriate technologies & system architecture, optimizing the JS performance with a proper optimization) Bring new and fresh ideas to the team Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders Mandatory Qualifications: Have good experience in using ReactJS, Redux, Typescript and Jest Proficient understanding of ECMAScript 6â€¯ Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3 Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX Desired Qualifications: Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to solve them Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks Experience in building upstream libraries Experience in building management UIs and/or portals Experience in back-end as well in at least 1 programming language Enjoy solving problems in the most efficient way while working in multi-cultural environments Coding as an art more than a tool Improve with the people around you while accepting given legacy system & rules Try to pursue an issue meticulously and not miss a thing with a careful attitude. Better safe than sorry. Not be fixated on ideally solution from technical perspective and come up with a realistic idea to meet business requirement Try to tackle proactively highly challenging issues and manage to get things done. Capacity to convince all stakeholders of choosing the best technical option in long-term and panoramic vision Have good experience in designing and creating good test cases for the code that you are working on Keywords JavaScript/ HTML / CSS / React / Redux / TypeScript / Node JS / AngularJS / Jest / Intern / webpack / Babel / Jenkins / Git / AMP / PWA #engineer #jobcategory02 #frontendengineer #webdeveloper #jobsubcategory19 #commerce #organization01 #RakutenIchiba #servicename01 #Java #programminglanguage02 #JavaScript #programminglanguage07 Languages: English (Overall - 4 - Fluent) In Japanese, Rakuten stands for â€˜optimism.â€™ It means we believe in the future. Itâ€™s an understanding that, with the right mind-set, we can make the future better by what we do today. So we challenge ourselves to evolve, innovate and experiment, to create a better, brighter future for everyone. Today, our 70+ businesses span e-commerce, digital content, communications and fintech, bringing the joy of discovery to almost 1.3 billion members across the world. If you have any trouble logging in, please contact us here Rakuten Group, Inc.: rakuten-recruiting-info@mail.rakuten.com *Please read the Application Requirements(EN) / å‹Ÿé›†è¦é …(JP) before applying. Our Diversity & Inclusion Policy and Application Documents Rakutenâ€™s corporate mission is to â€œcontribute to society by creating value through innovation and entrepreneurship.â€ We foster a culture that provides equal opportunities to those who share this founding philosophy and take on the challenge to transform society, regardless of age, gender, nationality, or any other status. Diversity is one of Rakuten's core strategies and a driving force for innovation. Because of this, you are not required to submit any of the following information in order to apply for our job positions. - Gender - Age - Photo - Nationality* - Information not related to business, such as ideological beliefs, family structure, etc. * For legal compliance, we may ask you about your work eligibility
